Barbell Behind Neck Press.title: Barbell Behind Neck Press
Barbell Behind Neck Press.description: Grasp barbell with overhand grip from rack or clean from floor. Position bar behind neck. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return behind neck and repeat.

Barbell Front Raise.title: Barbell Front Raise
Barbell Front Raise.description: Grasp barbell with overhand grip with elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise barbell forward and upward until upper arms are above horizontal. Lower and repeat.

Barbell Incline Front Raise.title: Barbell Incline Front Raise
Barbell Incline Front Raise.description: Grasp barbell with shoulder width overhand grip. Lie supine on upper portion of 45 degree incline bench with legs straight. Position barbell on top of upper thighs. With elbows straight or slightly bent, raise barbell up and over shoulders until uppers arm are vertical. Lower barbell to upper thigh and repeat.

Barbell Military Press.title: Barbell Military Press
Barbell Military Press.description: Grasp barbell from rack or clean barbell from floor with overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder width. Position bar in front of neck. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower to front of neck and repeat.

Barbell Seated Military Press.title: Barbell Seated Military Press
Barbell Seated Military Press.description: Grasp barbell with slightly wider than shoulder width overhand grip from rack. Position bar near upper chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return to upper chest and repeat.

Barbell Shoulder Press.title: Barbell Shoulder Press
Barbell Shoulder Press.description: Grasp barbell with slightly wider than shoulder width overhand grip from rack. Position bar near upper chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return to upper chest and repeat.

Cable Bar Behind Neck Press.title: Cable Bar Behind Neck Press
Cable Bar Behind Neck Press.description: Stand facing cable bar, mounted on each side to upper waist height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip upper chest height. Stand directly between both cable pulleys with one foot forward and other foot back. Push cable bar over head and position cable bar behind neck or rest on shoulders. Press cable bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return behind neck and repeat.

Cable Bar Military Press.title: Cable Bar Military Press
Cable Bar Military Press.description: Stand facing cable bar, mounted on each side to upper waist height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder width. Position cable bar upper chest height. Stand directly between both cable pulleys with one foot forward and other foot back. Press cable bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return to upper chest and repeat.

Cable Bar Shoulder Press.title: Cable Bar Shoulder Press
Cable Bar Shoulder Press.description: Stand facing cable bar mounted on each side to upper waist height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip and position upper chest height. Stand directly between both cable pulleys with one foot forward and other foot back. Press cable bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Return to upper chest and repeat.

Cable Seated Front Raise.title: Cable Seated Front Raise
Cable Seated Front Raise.description: Sit on seat above twin cable pulleys. Grasp stirrups on each side. Sit upright with arms straight down to each side with palms facing back. Raise stirrups forward and upward until upper arms are well above horizontal. Lower and repeat.

Cable Alternating Front Raise.title: Cable Alternating Front Raise
Cable Alternating Front Raise.description: Stand with low double pulleys behind. Grasp stirrup attachments, one in each hand. Stand away from pulley slightly with arms back somewhat at side and elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise one stirrup forward and upward until upper arm is well above horizontal. Lower and repeat with opposite arm, alternating between arms.

Cable Alternating Seated Front Raise.title: Cable Alternating Seated Front Raise
Cable Alternating Seated Front Raise.description: Sit on seat above twin cable pulleys. Grasp stirrups on each side. Sit upright with arms straight down to each side with palms facing back. Raise one stirrup forward and upward until upper arm is well above horizontal. Lower and repeat with opposite arm. Continue by alternating raises between sides.

Cable One Arm Front Raise.title: Cable One Arm Front Raise
Cable One Arm Front Raise.description: Grasp stirrup attachment. Stand away from pulley slightly with arm back somewhat at side and elbow straight or slightly bent. Raise stirrup forward and upward until upper arm is well above horizontal. Lower and repeat. Repeat with opposite arm.

Cable One Arm Front Raise (with rope).title: Cable One Arm Front Raise (with rope)
Cable One Arm Front Raise (with rope).description: Grasp end of Triceps Rope Cable attachment with one hand so that protruding end is in contact with side of hand (thumb and index finger). Stand away from pulley with arm back at side and elbow straight. Raise stirrup forward and upward until arm is well above horizontal or cable makes contact with underside of upper arm. Lower and repeat. Repeat with opposite arm.

Cable Standing Shoulder Press.title: Cable Standing Shoulder Press
Cable Standing Shoulder Press.description: Stand between two low to medium height pulleys. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups to each side of shoulders with elbows down to sides and stirrups above or slightly narrower than elbows. Push stirrups upward until arms are extended overhead. Return stirrups to sides of shoulders and repeat.

Cable Shoulder Press.title: Cable Shoulder Press
Cable Shoulder Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups from low to medium low position from each side. Position stirrups to each side of shoulders with elbows down to sides and stirrups above or slightly narrower than elbows. Push stirrups upward until arms are extended overhead. Return stirrups to sides of shoulders and repeat.

Cable Twisting Overhead Press.title: Cable Twisting Overhead Press
Cable Twisting Overhead Press.description: Stand beside low to medium height pulley. Grasp cable stirrup. Position stirrup to front of shoulder with elbow down to side. Place opposite hand on hip. With feet wide apart, squat down slightly. Rotate body away from pulley and straighten legs while pushing stirrup diagonally upward toward opposite side of body. Return to original position and repeat.

Dumbbell Arnold Press.title: Dumbbell Arnold Press
Dumbbell Arnold Press.description: Stand with two dumbbells position in front of shoulders, palms facing body and elbows under wrists. Initiate movement by bringing elbows out to sides. Continue to raise elbows outward while pressing dumbbells overhead until arms are straight. Lower to front of shoulders in opposite pattern and repeat.

Dumbbell Front Raise.title: Dumbbell Front Raise
Dumbbell Front Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells in both hands. Position dumbbells in front of upper legs with elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise dumbbells forward and upward until upper arms are above horizontal. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Alternating Front Raise.title: Dumbbell Alternating Front Raise
Dumbbell Alternating Front Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells in both hands. Position dumbbells in front of upper legs with elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise one dumbbell forward and upward with until upper arm is above horizontal. Lower and repeat with opposite arm, alternating between arms.

Dumbbell Alternating Incline Front Raise.title: Dumbbell Alternating Incline Front Raise
Dumbbell Alternating Incline Front Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells and lie supine on upper portion of 45 degree incline bench with legs straight. Position dumbbells downward below each shoulder. With elbows straight or slightly bent, raise one dumbbell forward, up and over shoulder until upper arm is vertical. Lower dumbbell down to starting position. Repeat raise with other arm, alternating between sides.

Dumbbell Shoulder Press.title: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
Dumbbell Shoulder Press.description: Position dumbbells to each side of shoulders with elbows below wrists. Press dumbbells upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower to sides of shoulders and repeat.

Dumbbell One Arm Shoulder Press.title: Dumbbell One Arm Shoulder Press
Dumbbell One Arm Shoulder Press.description: Stand with dumbbells positioned near shoulder with elbow below wrists. Press dumbbell upward until arm is extended overhead. Lower to side of shoulder and repeat.

Lever Behind Neck Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Behind Neck Press (plate loaded)
Lever Behind Neck Press (plate loaded).description: Sit back on seat. Grasp lever bars to each side with overhand grip. Press levers upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Lever Barbell Behind Neck Press (plate l.title: Lever Barbell Behind Neck Press (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Behind Neck Press (plate l.description: Sit on bench with bar positioned behind shoulders, also facing away from fulcrum. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower bar behind neck and repeat.

Lever Military Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Military Press (plate loaded)
Lever Military Press (plate loaded).description: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press lever until arms are extended upward. Lower and repeat.

Lever Reclined Shoulder Press (plate loa.title: Lever Reclined Shoulder Press (plate loaded)
Lever Reclined Shoulder Press (plate loa.description: Lie on back pad facing up. Grasp lever handles on each side with overhand grip. Press lever until arms are extended. Lower and repeat.

Lever Shoulder Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Shoulder Press (plate loaded)
Lever Shoulder Press (plate loaded).description: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press lever upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Lever Barbell Shoulder Press (plate load.title: Lever Barbell Shoulder Press (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Shoulder Press (plate load.description: Sit on bench with bar positioned in front of shoulders. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower bar to front of shoulders and repeat.

Lever One Arm Shoulder Press (plate load.title: Lever One Arm Shoulder Press (plate loaded)
Lever One Arm Shoulder Press (plate load.description: Stand to one side, near loaded end of barbell, opposite of landmine lever. Lift end of barbell and position near shoulder with underhand grip. Stand with feet far apart (leg on same side of loaded arm is back and opposite leg is forward and bent). Press end of barbell upward and forward until arm is extended. Lower to shoulder and repeat. Repeat with opposite side.

Lever One Arm Front Raise.title: Lever One Arm Front Raise
Lever One Arm Front Raise.description: Stand with lever to side, fulcrum approximately shoulder height and handle just below hip. Grasp lever handle with elbow straight or slightly bent. Raise lever handle forward and upward until upper arm is well above horizontal. Lower and repeat. Repeat with opposite arm.

Lever Reclined Shoulder Press.title: Lever Reclined Shoulder Press
Lever Reclined Shoulder Press.description: Lie on back pad facing up. Grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press lever until arms are extended. Lower and repeat.

Lever Reclined Parallel Grip Shoulder Pr.title: Lever Reclined Parallel Grip Shoulder Press
Lever Reclined Parallel Grip Shoulder Pr.description: Lie on back pad facing up. Grasp parallel lever handles on each side. Press lever until arms are extended. Lower and repeat.

Lever Shoulder Press.title: Lever Shoulder Press
Lever Shoulder Press.description: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press lever upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Lever Shoulder Press (parallel grip).title: Lever Shoulder Press (parallel grip)
Lever Shoulder Press (parallel grip).description: Sit on seat and grasp parallel bar grips in front of shoulders on each side. Press lever upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Lever Alternating Shoulder Press.title: Lever Alternating Shoulder Press
Lever Alternating Shoulder Press.description: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press one lever upward until arm is extended overhead. Lower to original position. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue by alternating movement between arms.

Sled Shoulder Press.title: Sled Shoulder Press
Sled Shoulder Press.description: Set and grasp lever handles to each side with overhand grip. Press handles upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Sled Shoulder Press (parallel grip).title: Sled Shoulder Press (parallel grip)
Sled Shoulder Press (parallel grip).description: Sit on seat and grasp parallel bar grips to front of shoulders on each side. Press handles upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower and repeat.

Smith Behind Neck Press.title: Smith Behind Neck Press
Smith Behind Neck Press.description: Sit on bench with bar positioned behind shoulders. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower bar behind neck and repeat.

Smith Shoulder Press.title: Smith Shoulder Press
Smith Shoulder Press.description: Sit on bench with bar positioned in front of shoulders. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Press bar upward until arms are extended overhead. Lower bar to front of shoulders and repeat.

Handstand Shoulder Press (between benche.title: Handstand Shoulder Press (between benches)
Handstand Shoulder Press (between benche.description: Stand facing wall between two benches positioned side by side, slightly apart, and slightly away and perpendicular to wall. Place hands on ends of benches closest to wall. Place forefeet on bench and kick lower body up to handstand position with arms and legs straight. Maintain balance with lower body against wall. Lower head between ends of benches by bending arms. Push body back up to original position by extending arms. Repeat.

Pike Press.title: Pike Press
Pike Press.description: Kneel on two benches positioned side by side slightly apart at end nearest head. Place hands on ends of benches. With forefeet on opposite ends of bench, raise rear end high up with arms, back, and knees straight. Adjust feet so they are somewhat close to hands while keeping back and legs straight. Lower head between ends of benches by bending arms. Push body back up to original position by extending arms. Repeat.

Decline Pike Press.title: Decline Pike Press
Decline Pike Press.description: Stand between two incline benches positioned side by side slightly apart at end nearest head. Place hands on ends of benches and straighten arms. Position forefeet on opposite ends of bench. Raise rear end high up with arms, back, and knees straight. Lower head between ends of benches by bending arms. Push body back up to original position by extending arms. Repeat.

Suspended Front Raise.title: Suspended Front Raise
Suspended Front Raise.description: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body reclines back behind suspension handles. Position body and legs straight at desired angle, hanging from handles with arms straight and palms facing downward. Raise arms upward over head by flexing shoulders with arms straight. Return and lower body back until arms are extended straight forward in original position. Repeat.

Barbell Upright Row.title: Barbell Upright Row
Barbell Upright Row.description: Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Barbell Wide Grip Upright Row.title: Barbell Wide Grip Upright Row
Barbell Wide Grip Upright Row.description: Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Cable Lateral Raise.title: Cable Lateral Raise
Cable Lateral Raise.description: With low pulleys to each side, grasp left stirrup with right hand and right stirrup with left hand. Stand upright. With elbows slightly bent, raise arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Cable One Arm Lateral Raise.title: Cable One Arm Lateral Raise
Cable One Arm Lateral Raise.description: Grasp stirrup cable attachment. Stand facing with side of resting arm toward low pulley. Grasp ballet bar if available. With elbow slightly bent, raise arm to side away from low pulley until elbow is shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Cable Lateral Raise (pulleys close).title: Cable Lateral Raise (pulleys close)
Cable Lateral Raise (pulleys close).description: Stand facing two low pulleys positioned side by side. Grasp stirrups with each hand. Stand upright with arms staight down to each side. With elbows slightly bent, raise arms to side until elbows are shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Cable Seated Lateral Raise.title: Cable Seated Lateral Raise
Cable Seated Lateral Raise.description: Sit on seat above twin cable pulleys. Grasp stirrups on each side. Sit upright with arms nearly straight down to each side. With elbows slightly bent, raise arms to side until elbows are shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Cable Upright Row.title: Cable Upright Row
Cable Upright Row.description: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Stand close to pulley. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Cable Bar Upright Row.title: Cable Bar Upright Row
Cable Bar Upright Row.description: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Stand close to cable bar. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Cable Upright Row (dual pulley).title: Cable Upright Row (dual pulley)
Cable Upright Row (dual pulley).description: Stand between low dual pulleys. Grasp handles with opposite hands - right hand holds left stirrup and left hand holds right stirrup. Stand upright with arms straight and palms facing back (overhand grip), one stirrup in front of other. Pull handles up to front of shoulders with elbows leading and cables crossed. Allow wrists to flex as stirrups are lifted. Lower and repeat.

Cable One Arm Upright Row.title: Cable One Arm Upright Row
Cable One Arm Upright Row.description: Grasp stirrup on low pulley with overhand grip. Stand with side of arm with stirup away from pulley machine, arm against front of body. Place other hand on ballet bar or side of pulley column for support. Pull stirup to front side of shoulder with elbow leading. Allow wrist to flex as stirrup is lifted. Lower and repeat.

Cable Upright Row (with rope attachment).title: Cable Upright Row (with rope attachment)
Cable Upright Row (with rope attachment).description: Grasp each side of rope with overhand grip, just under rope ends. Stand close to pulley. Pull rope ends to front of shoulders with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as stirrups are lifted. Lower and repeat.

Cable Upright Row (stirrup attachments).title: Cable Upright Row (stirrup attachments)
Cable Upright Row (stirrup attachments).description: Grasp handles of both stirrups with overhand grip. Stand close to pulley. Pull handles to front of shoulders with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as stirrups are lifted. Lower and repeat.

Cable Wide Grip Upright Row.title: Cable Wide Grip Upright Row
Cable Wide Grip Upright Row.description: Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Stand close to pulley. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Cable Y Raise.title: Cable Y Raise
Cable Y Raise.description: Stand facing between low pulleys medium width apart, grasp left stirrup with right hand and right stirrup with left hand. Step back slightly away from pulleys and stand upright with cables crossed in front of hips. With elbows slightly bent, raise arms upward and outward to sides in Y configuration until elbows are approximately lateral to each ear. Lower stirrups forward and downward in reverse pattern. Repeat.

Cable Seated Y Raise.title: Cable Seated Y Raise
Cable Seated Y Raise.description: On dual pulley seated row machine, sit slightly forward on seat or bench in order to grasp both cable attachments. Place feet on vertical platform. Position torso upright and slide hips back so knees are slightly bent. Raise arms upward and outward to sides in Y configuration while allowing elbows to partially bend. Pull back until elbows are approximately lateral to each ear. Lower stirrups forward and downward until arms are extended straight in front of body. Repeat.

Cable Seated Y Raise (with rope attachme.title: Cable Seated Y Raise (with rope attachment)
Cable Seated Y Raise (with rope attachme.description: Sit slightly forward on seat or bench and grasp ends of rope attachment with hand. Place feet on vertical platform. Slide hips back so knees are slightly bent. With torso upright pull rope upward over head until elbows are approximately lateral to each ear. Lower stirrups forward and downward until arms are extended straight in front of body. Repeat.

Dumbbell Incline Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Incline Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Incline Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell in one hand. Lie on 30° to 45° incline bench with opposite side of body on incline, arm over top of bench, lower leg positioned on front side of seat, and upper leg on back side of seat. Position dumbbell inside of lower leg, just in front of upper leg. Raise dumbbell from until upper arm is perpendicular to torso. Maintain slight fixed bend in elbow throughout exercise. Lower dumbbell to front of upper leg and repeat.

Dumbbell Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells in front of thighs with elbows slightly bent. Bend over slightly with hips and knees bent slightly. Raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain elbows' height above or equal to wrists. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell One Arm Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell One Arm Lateral Raise
Dumbbell One Arm Lateral Raise.description: Position dumbbell in front of pelvis with elbow slightly bent. Grasp stationary object with other hand for support. Bend over with hips and knees bent slightly. Raise upper arm to side until elbow is shoulder height. Maintain elbow's height above or equal to wrist. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell One Arm Seated Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell One Arm Seated Lateral Raise
Dumbbell One Arm Seated Lateral Raise.description: Sit on stool or end of bench with legs together. Position dumbbell to side with elbow slightly bent. Angle torso slightly forward and place free hand on end of thigh for support. Raise upper arm to side until elbow is shoulder height. Maintain elbow's height above or equal to wrist. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Lying Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Lying Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Lying Lateral Raise.description: Lie on side with legs separated for support. Grasp dumbbell in front of thigh. Raise dumbbell from floor until arm is vertical. Maintain fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Raise.title: Dumbbell Raise
Dumbbell Raise.description: Stand and grasp dumbbells with arms to side, palms facing sides of thighs. Pull dumbbells up to sides of ribs with elbows out to sides. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Upright Row.title: Dumbbell Upright Row
Dumbbell Upright Row.description: Grasp dumbbells and stand with palms facing front of thighs. Pull dumbbells to front of shoulder with elbows leading out to sides. Allow wrists to flex as dumbbells rise upward. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell One Arm Upright Row.title: Dumbbell One Arm Upright Row
Dumbbell One Arm Upright Row.description: Grasp dumbbells with palms facing front of thighs. Position other hand for support. Pull dumbbell to front of shoulder with elbow leading. Allow wrist to flex as dumbbell rises upward. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Seated Upright Row.title: Dumbbell Seated Upright Row
Dumbbell Seated Upright Row.description: Sit on end of bench with legs far apart. Grasp dumbbell between legs with arm vertical under shoulder. Position torso slightly forward with hand on knee for support. Pull dumbbell to front of shoulder with elbow leading out to side. Allow wrists to flex as dumbbell rises upward. Lower and repeat.

Lever Barbell Upright Row (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Upright Row (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Upright Row (plate loaded).description: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height, facing away from from fulcrum. Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Lever Lateral Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Lateral Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Lateral Raise (plate loaded).description: Sit in machine. Situate bent arms between padded lever and sides of body. Raise arms to sides until upper arms are horizontal. Return and repeat.

Lever Lateral Raise.title: Lever Lateral Raise
Lever Lateral Raise.description: Sit in machine. Situate bent arms between padded lever and sides of body. Grasp handles if available. Raise arms to sides until upper arms are horizontal. Return and repeat.

Lever Extended Arm Lateral Raise.title: Lever Extended Arm Lateral Raise
Lever Extended Arm Lateral Raise.description: Stand facing machine and grasp lever handles to each side with elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise lever handles to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain elbows' height above or equal to wrists. Lower and repeat.

Lever Extended Arm Kneeling Lateral Rais.title: Lever Extended Arm Kneeling Lateral Raise
Lever Extended Arm Kneeling Lateral Rais.description: Kneel on shin pads facing machine and grasp lever handles to each side with elbows straight or slightly bent. Raise lever handles to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain elbows' height above or equal to wrists. Lower and repeat.

Smith Upright Row.title: Smith Upright Row
Smith Upright Row.description: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height. Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Smith Wide Grip Upright Row.title: Smith Wide Grip Upright Row
Smith Wide Grip Upright Row.description: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height. Grasp bar with wide grip overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright. Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.

Suspended Y Lateral Raise.title: Suspended Y Lateral Raise
Suspended Y Lateral Raise.description: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body reclines back behind suspension handles. Position body and legs straight at desired angle hanging from handles with arms straight and palms angled inward. Raise arms upward and outward in shape of a Y while keeping arms straight. Return and lower body back in opposite motion until arms are extended straight forward in original position. Repeat.

Angled Side Bridge.title: Angled Side Bridge
Angled Side Bridge.description: Place forearm on padded elevated surface, positioned perpendicular to body. Position feet out away from elevated surface, one foot in front of other with hips and knees straight. Place free hand on upper hip and allow lower hip and waist to bend downward. Raise hips upward by lateral flexion of spine. Lower to original position and repeat. Repeat with opposite side.

Barbell Rear Delt Raise.title: Barbell Rear Delt Raise
Barbell Rear Delt Raise.description: Stand holding barbell behind thighs or hips with arms straight down to sides. Pull barbell behind hips and low back up as far as possible allowing elbows to travel up behind body to each side. Flex wrists near top of movement so bar can be raised higher. Lower until arms and wrists are straight. Repeat.

Barbell Rear Delt Row.title: Barbell Rear Delt Row
Barbell Rear Delt Row.description: Bend knees slightly and bend over bar with back straight, approximately horizontal. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso, pull barbell up toward upper chest until upper arms are just beyond horizontal. Return and repeat.

Barbell Lying Rear Delt Row.title: Barbell Lying Rear Delt Row
Barbell Lying Rear Delt Row.description: Lie chest down on elevated bench. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso, pull barbell up toward upper chest until upper arms are just beyond parallel to floor. Return and repeat.

Cable Reverse Fly.title: Cable Reverse Fly
Cable Reverse Fly.description: Stand facing twin pulley cables positioned close together and approximately shoulder height. Grasp stirrup cable attachment in each hand. Step back away from machine so cable is taut. Stand with feet staggered. Point elbows outward with arms straight or slightly bent. Pull stirrups out to sides, maintaining stiff elbow position throughout exercise. Return to original position and repeat.

Cable Seated Reverse Fly.title: Cable Seated Reverse Fly
Cable Seated Reverse Fly.description: Sit on seat facing twin pulley cables positioned approximately shoulder height. Grasp stirrup cable attachment in each hand. Straighten lower back upright so cable is taut. Point elbows outward with arms slightly bent. Keeping elbows pointed high, pull stirrups out to sides, maintaining slightly bent elbow position throughout exercise. Return to original position and repeat.

Cable One Arm Reverse Fly.title: Cable One Arm Reverse Fly
Cable One Arm Reverse Fly.description: Stand with side to shoulder height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup cable attachment with hand furthest from pulley. Position arm across neck with elbow bent 30° to 45° outward. Keeping elbows pointed high, pull stirrup out to side, maintaining fixed elbow position throughout exercise. Return to original position and repeat. Repeat with other arm.

Cable Supine Reverse Fly.title: Cable Supine Reverse Fly
Cable Supine Reverse Fly.description: With bench between two high pulleys to each side, grasp left stirrup with right hand and right stirrup with left hand. Lie on bench with pulleys to each side of shoulders. Arms should be crossed above upper chest with elbows slightly bent. Pull upper arms down to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (just slightly bent) as arms are pulled down to sides. Return arms to original position and repeat.

Cable Rear Delt Row.title: Cable Rear Delt Row
Cable Rear Delt Row.description: Sit slightly forward on bench or platform in order to grasp cable bar attachment. With elbow width overhand grip, straighten torso upright and slide hips back until knees are only slightly bent. Pull cable attachment toward upper chest, just below neck, with elbows up out to sides until elbows travel slightly behind back. Keep upper arms horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Rear Delt Row.title: Cable One Arm Rear Delt Row
Cable One Arm Rear Delt Row.description: Sit slightly forward on bench or platform in order to grasp stirrup cable attachment with one hand. Straighten torso upright and slide hips back until knees are only slightly bent. Point elbow out to side. Pull stirrup out to side, elbows up shoulder height until elbows travel slightly behind back. Allow wrist to follow elbow. Keep upper arm horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arm is extended and shoulder is stretched forward. Repeat.

Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (with rope).title: Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (with rope)
Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (with rope).description: Stand facing rope attachment on high pulley cable. Grasp each end of rope just above enlarged ends. Step back with one foot so arms and shoulders are positioned straight forward with cable taut. Point elbows outward. Pull rope to upper chest or neck, keeping elbows at shoulder height until elbows travel slightly behind back. Keep upper arms perpendicular to trunk. Return until arms are extended forward. Repeat.

Cable Rear Delt Row (stirrups).title: Cable Rear Delt Row (stirrups)
Cable Rear Delt Row (stirrups).description: On dual pulley seated row machine, sit slightly forward on seat or bench in order to grasp both cable attachments. Place feet on vertical platform. Position torso upright and slide hips back until knees are only slightly bent and cable taut. Point elbows outward. Pull stirrups out to sides, keeping elbows at shoulder height until elbows travel slightly behind back. Allow wrists to follow elbows. Keep upper arms horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Cable Seated Rear Delt Row (stirrups).title: Cable Seated Rear Delt Row (stirrups)
Cable Seated Rear Delt Row (stirrups).description: Sit on seat facing twin pulley cables positioned shoulder height. Grasp stirrup cable attachment in each hand. Straighten lower back upright so arms and shoulders are positioned straight forward with cable taut. Point elbows outward. Pull stirrups out to sides, keeping elbows at shoulder height until elbows travel slightly behind back. Allow wrists to follow elbows. Keep upper arms horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (stirrups).title: Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (stirrups)
Cable Standing Rear Delt Row (stirrups).description: Stand facing twin pulley cables positioned shoulder height. Grasp stirrup cable attachment in each hand. Step back with one foot so arms and shoulders are positioned straight forward with cable taut. Point elbows outward. Pull stirrups out to sides, keeping elbows at shoulder height until elbows travel slightly behind back. Allow wrists to follow elbows. Keep upper arms horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Cable Rear Lateral Raise.title: Cable Rear Lateral Raise
Cable Rear Lateral Raise.description: Stand with cable columns to each side. Grasp left stirrup with right hand and right stirrup with left hand. Bend knees and bend over at hips, so torso is approximately horizontal with back straight. Point elbows outward with arms slightly bent. Raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and slight bend in elbows as arms are raised to sides. Lower and repeat.

Cable One Arm Rear Lateral Raise.title: Cable One Arm Rear Lateral Raise
Cable One Arm Rear Lateral Raise.description: Stand with side to low pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment with hand furthest from pulley. Bend knees slightly and bend over with resting arm to side of low pulley. Raise arm to side until elbow is shoulder height. Maintain upper arm perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Lower and repeat. Repeat with other arm.

Cable Seated Rear Lateral Raise.title: Cable Seated Rear Lateral Raise
Cable Seated Rear Lateral Raise.description: Sit at edge of bench with feet of floor ahead of knees. Rest torso on thighs. Reach under legs and grasp stirrup cable attachments, right hand holding left stirrup, left hand holding right stirrup. Pull stirrups out to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Lower until arms contact sides of legs. Repeat.

Cable Standing Cross Row.title: Cable Standing Cross Row
Cable Standing Cross Row.description: Stand between two shoulder-high cable pulleys (adjustable cross-over machine). Grasp right stirrup with left hand and left stirrup with right hand. Step back until cables are angled back 30° to 45°. Position both elbows at height of shoulders, one over other. Pull both cable attachments by moving elbows back to sides. Keep upper arms horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return and repeat.

Cable One Arm Standing Cross Row.title: Cable One Arm Standing Cross Row
Cable One Arm Standing Cross Row.description: Facing shoulder height cable pulley, grasp stirrup cable attachment with one hand, palm orientated down. Step back and turn body inward about 30° to 45° to face extended arm about. Stand back just enough to allow arm to be fully extended with weight raised up slightly. Pull stirrup back with elbow up at shoulder height until elbow travels just behind shoulder. Keep upper arm horizontal, perpendicular to trunk. Return until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Dumbbell Lying Rear Delt Row.title: Dumbbell Lying Rear Delt Row
Dumbbell Lying Rear Delt Row.description: Lie chest down on elevated bench. Grasp dumbbells below. Keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso and dumbbells just below elbows, pull dumbbells up until elbows are just above shoulders. Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Lying Rear Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Lying Rear Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Lying Rear Lateral Raise.description: Lie chest down on elevated bench. Grasp dumbbells below to each side. Raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Maintain height of elbows above wrists by raising "pinkie" side up. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Lying One Arm Rear Lateral Rais.title: Dumbbell Lying One Arm Rear Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Lying One Arm Rear Lateral Rais.description: With dumbbell in one hand, lie chest down on elevated bench. Position palm forward (thumb up) with elbow straight or slightly bent. Raise upper arm to side until elbow is shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso with elbow straight throughout exercise. Maintain palm forward position. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Rear Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Rear Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Rear Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells to each side. Bend knees and bend over through hips with back flat, close to horizontal. Position elbows with slight bend and palms facing together. Raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Maintain height of elbows above wrists by raising "pinkie finger" side up. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Rear Delt Row.title: Dumbbell Rear Delt Row
Dumbbell Rear Delt Row.description: Kneel over side of bench with arm and leg to side. Grasp dumbbell. Pull dumbbell up out to side with upper arm perpendicular to trunk until upper arm is just beyond horizontal. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Seated Rear Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Seated Rear Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Seated Rear Lateral Raise.description: Sit on edge of bench with feet placed beyond knees. Bend over and rest torso on thighs. Grasp dumbbells with each hand under legs. Position elbows with slight bend with palms facing together behind ankles (as shown) or just to sides of ankles. Raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Maintain elbows height above wrists by raising "pinkie finger" side up. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Side Lying Rear Delt Raise.title: Dumbbell Side Lying Rear Delt Raise
Dumbbell Side Lying Rear Delt Raise.description: Lie on side with legs separated for support. Grasp dumbbell in front of chest, palm facing down, arm extended forward with slight bend. Raise dumbbell from floor until it travels above shoulder. Return dumbbell to floor at original position. Repeat.

Lever Incline Rear Delt Row (plate loade.title: Lever Incline Rear Delt Row (plate loaded)
Lever Incline Rear Delt Row (plate loade.description: Lie chest low on inclined platform and grasp forward lever handles with wide overhand grip. Pull lever with elbows forward out to sides until upper arms are just beyond parallel, keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso. Return and repeat.

Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise (plate lo.title: Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise (plate lo.description: Lie on machine with chest against padding. Position arms between padded lever arms with elbows below shoulders. Pull arms up until elbows are beyond back. Return and repeat.

Lever Rear Delt Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Rear Delt Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Rear Delt Raise (plate loaded).description: Stand between lever handles facing away from machine. Squat down and grasp lever handles to each side. Stand up with arms straight to sides. Pull lever up as far as possible allowing elbows to travel up behind body to each side. Lower until arms are straight and repeat.

Lever Seated Rear Delt Row (plate loaded.title: Lever Seated Rear Delt Row (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Rear Delt Row (plate loaded.description: Place seat at low position. Sit on seat with chest against pad and grasp upper handles. Pull lever with elbows up out to sides until upper arms are just beyond parallel, keeping upper arm horizontal, perpendicular to torso. Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Rear Lateral Raise (plate l.title: Lever Seated Rear Lateral Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Rear Lateral Raise (plate l.description: Sit on seat with feet placed on platform ahead of knees. Rest torso on thighs. Reach under legs and grasp lever handles on each side. Pull lever handles out to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Maintain upper arms perpendicular to torso and fixed elbow position (10° to 30° angle) throughout exercise. Lower and repeat.

Lever T-Bar Rear Delt Row (plate loaded).title: Lever T-Bar Rear Delt Row (plate loaded)
Lever T-Bar Rear Delt Row (plate loaded).description: Straddle lever bar facing handles. Bend knees slightly and bend over handles with back straight. Grasp wide grip handles with overhand grip. With arms extended, position torso just high enough to allow weight to make contact with floor. With elbows out to sides, pull bar up toward upper chest until elbows are same height as shoulders or just beyond, keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso. Return and repeat.

Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise.title: Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise
Lever Lying Rear Lateral Raise.description: Lie on machine with chest against padding. Position arms between padded lever arms with elbows below shoulders. Pull arms up until elbows are beyond back. Lower and repeat.

Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on lateral rai.title: Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on lateral raise machine)
Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on lateral rai.description: Stand on platform facing lateral raise machine. Bend knees and bend over at hips with back flat close to horizontal. With elbows bent under shoulders, position back of upper arms against arm pads. Maintaining torso position, raise upper arms to sides until elbows are shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on extended ar.title: Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on extended arm kneeling lateral raise machine)
Lever Rear Lateral Raise (on extended ar.description: Stand on platform facing lateral raise machine. Bend knees and bend over at hips with back flat close to horizontal. With arms straight or slightly bent, grasp lever handles with each hand. Maintaining torso position, raise handles to sides until upper arm is shoulder height. Lower and repeat.

Lever Seated Rear Delt Row.title: Lever Seated Rear Delt Row
Lever Seated Rear Delt Row.description: Place seat at low position. Sit on seat with chest against pad and grasp upper handles. Pull lever with elbows up out to sides until upper arms are just beyond parallel, keeping upper arm horizontal, perpendicular to torso. Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Fly (parallel grip).title: Lever Seated Reverse Fly (parallel grip)
Lever Seated Reverse Fly (parallel grip).description: Sit on machine with chest against pad. Grasp parallel handles with thumbs up at shoulder height. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are also at height of shoulders. Keeping elbows pointed high, pull handles apart and to rear until elbows are just behind back. Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Fly (gripless).title: Lever Seated Reverse Fly (gripless)
Lever Seated Reverse Fly (gripless).description: Sit on machine with back against vertical pad and roller pads in front of body. Place feet forward on foot bars. Cross both arms in front of body situated between roller pads. Position arms one on top of another, shoulder height. Pull arms apart and back until elbows are slightly beyond back. Return to starting position and repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Fly (on pec deck).title: Lever Seated Reverse Fly (on pec deck)
Lever Seated Reverse Fly (on pec deck).description: Sit on machine with chest against vertical pad. Position arms against padded lever arms at height of shoulders. Pull arms back until elbows are beyond back. Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Fly (overhand grip).title: Lever Seated Reverse Fly (overhand grip)
Lever Seated Reverse Fly (overhand grip).description: Sit on machine with chest against pad. Grasp horizontal handles with overhand grip at shoulder height. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are also at height of shoulders. Keeping elbows pointed high, pull handles apart and to rear until elbows are just behind back Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Fly (pronated paral.title: Lever Seated Reverse Fly (pronated parallel grip)
Lever Seated Reverse Fly (pronated paral.description: Sit in machine with chest against pad. Grasp parallel handles from inside with thumbs down at shoulder height. Keeping elbows pointed high, pull handles apart and to rear until elbows are just behind back. Return and repeat.

Smith Rear Delt Row.title: Smith Rear Delt Row
Smith Rear Delt Row.description: Stand near low smith bar. Bend knees and bend over bar with back straight. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Keeping upper arm perpendicular to torso, pull bar up toward upper chest until upper arms are just beyond parallel to floor. Return and repeat.

Rear Delt Inverted Row.title: Rear Delt Inverted Row
Rear Delt Inverted Row.description: Stand facing waist to lower chest height horizontal bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Turn elbows outward to sides. Walk forward under bar while pulling upper chest close to bar. With heels on floor, position body at angle under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Position forearms perpendicular to body, orientated forward. Also, position upper arms perpendicular to body, orientated to each side. Lower body downward until arms are extended straight while keeping body straight and elbows high (upper arm perpendicular to torso). Pull body toward bar until upper arms are just beyond parallel to one another. Return and repeat.

Rear Delt Inverted Row (high bar).title: Rear Delt Inverted Row (high bar)
Rear Delt Inverted Row (high bar).description: Stand facing lower to upper chest height horizontal bar. Step toward bar so chest makes contact. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Turn elbows outward to sides. Position feet forward on floor so body is reclined back with legs, hips and spine straight. Position forearms perpendicular to body, orientated forward. Also, position upper arms perpendicular to body, orientated to each side. Lower body back until arms are extended straight while keeping body straight and elbows high (upper arm perpendicular to torso). Pull body toward bar until upper arms are just beyond parallel to one another. Return and repeat.

Rear Delt Inverted Row (on hips).title: Rear Delt Inverted Row (on hips)
Rear Delt Inverted Row (on hips).description: Lay on back with belly under fixed horizontal bar. Bend knees and position feet on floor. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Turn elbows outward to sides.Walk forward under bar while pulling upper chest close to bar. With heels on floor, position body at angle under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Position forearms perpendicular to body, orientated forward. Also, position upper arms perpendicular to body, orientated to each side. Keeping hips on floor, low back straight, and elbow pointed out to sides; pull torso up to bar. Return when upper arms are just beyond parallel to one another. Lower body downward until arms are extended straight. Return and repeat.

Suspended Rear Delt Row.title: Suspended Rear Delt Row
Suspended Rear Delt Row.description: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body reclines back behind suspension handles.Position body and legs straight at desired angle hanging from handles with arms straight. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are positioned directly outwards. Pull body up while keeping elbows pointed directly out to each side and body and legs straight. Pull until elbows are directly lateral to each side without allowing elbows to drop. Return until arms are extended straight and shoulders are stretched forward, maintaining high elbow position. Repeat.

Suspended Reverse Fly.title: Suspended Reverse Fly
Suspended Reverse Fly.description: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body reclines back behind suspension handles. Position body and legs straight at desired angle hanging from handles with arms straight. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are positioned directly outwards with arms straight or slightly bent. Shoulder should be positioned approximately 90° relative to torso position. Pull handles out to sides while keeping stiff elbow position and maintaining shoulder at 90° plane to torso throughout exercise. Raise up until upper arms are in-line to one another. Return to original position in same plane and repeat.

Cable Front Lateral Raise.title: Cable Front Lateral Raise
Cable Front Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell cable attachment. Stand facing side with resting arm toward low pulley. Grasp ballet bar if available for support. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides. With elbow straight or slightly bent, raise upper arm away from low pulley to side, slightly to front (30°) until upper arm is shoulder height. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Seated Front Lateral Raise.title: Cable Seated Front Lateral Raise
Cable Seated Front Lateral Raise.description: Sit on seat above twin cable pulleys. Grasp stirrups on each side. Sit upright with arms nearly straight down to each side. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides. With elbows straight or slightly bent, raise upper arm away from low pulley to side, slightly to front (30° to 45°) until upper arm is shoulder height or slightly higher. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Front Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Front Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Front Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell and position in front of thigh with arm straight. Turn pinkie finger side outward. Raise arms to side, slightly to front until shoulder height or slightly higher. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Seated Front Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Seated Front Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Seated Front Lateral Raise.description: Sit on stool or end of bench with dumbbell. Position dumbbell down to side with arm straight. Turn pinkie finger side outward. Raise arms to side, slightly in front until shoulder height or slightly higher. Lower and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Full Can Lateral Raise.title: Dumbbell Full Can Lateral Raise
Dumbbell Full Can Lateral Raise.description: Grasp dumbbells with each hand with palms facing forward. Raise arms to side with thumb side up. Lower and repeat.

Barbell Reverse Curl.title: Barbell Reverse Curl
Barbell Reverse Curl.description: Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Reverse Preacher Curl.title: Barbell Reverse Preacher Curl
Barbell Reverse Preacher Curl.description: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Standing Reverse Preacher Curl.title: Barbell Standing Reverse Preacher Curl
Barbell Standing Reverse Preacher Curl.description: Place back of arms on pad with one foot forward. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Hammer Curl.title: Cable Hammer Curl
Cable Hammer Curl.description: Grasp cable rope with palms facing inward. Stand upright with arms straight down to sides. With elbows to side, raise rope forward and upward with both arms until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Reverse Curl.title: Cable Reverse Curl
Cable Reverse Curl.description: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Bar Reverse Curl.title: Cable Bar Reverse Curl
Cable Bar Reverse Curl.description: Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Stand close to cable bar. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Reverse Preacher Curl.title: Cable Reverse Preacher Curl
Cable Reverse Preacher Curl.description: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Standing Reverse Preacher Curl.title: Cable Standing Reverse Preacher Curl
Cable Standing Reverse Preacher Curl.description: Stand behind preacher bench. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Position back of arms on pad. Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Dumbbell Hammer Curl.title: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
Dumbbell Hammer Curl.description: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight. With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell until forearm is vertical and thumb faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with alternative arm.

Lever Hammer Preacher Curl.title: Lever Hammer Preacher Curl
Lever Hammer Preacher Curl.description: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles and position grips with thumb side up. Align elbows at near same pivot point as fulcrum of lever. Raise lever handles toward shoulders, maintaining palms in grip. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Curl.title: Lever Reverse Curl
Lever Reverse Curl.description: Sit on seat and grasp handles with overhand grip. Position elbows to sides so they are in line with lever's fulcrum. Raise lever handles until elbows are fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Preacher Curl.title: Lever Reverse Preacher Curl
Lever Reverse Preacher Curl.description: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with overhand grip. Align elbows at near same pivot point as fulcrum of lever. Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Wrist Curl.title: Barbell Wrist Curl
Barbell Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp bar with narrow to shoulder width underhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees. Allow barbell to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise barbell back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Wrist Curl.title: Cable Wrist Curl
Cable Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width underhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees. Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable One Arm Wrist Curl.title: Cable One Arm Wrist Curl
Cable One Arm Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm up and wrist just beyond knees. Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Roller Wrist Flexion.title: Cable Roller Wrist Flexion
Cable Roller Wrist Flexion.description: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands; over hand grip. With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.

Dumbbell Wrist Curl.title: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
Dumbbell Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp dumbbell with underhand grip. Rest forearm on thigh with wrist just beyond knee. Allow dumbbell to roll out of palm down to fingers. Raise dumbbell back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Ulnar Deviation.title: Dumbbell Ulnar Deviation
Dumbbell Ulnar Deviation.description: Grasp half loaded dumbbell with plate on pinkie side. Position arm down to side. Bend wrist so weighted side is pulled upward. Lower until weighted side is pointing downward. Repeat.

Lever Grip (plate loaded).title: Lever Grip (plate loaded)
Lever Grip (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat, straddling apparatus. Grasp lever handles on each side; fingers around lever handles and base of thumbs around stationary bars. Squeeze bars together with both hands until lower lever makes contact with upper bars. Lower to original position and repeat.

Lever Wrist Curl (plate loaded).title: Lever Wrist Curl (plate loaded)
Lever Wrist Curl (plate loaded).description: Grasp bar with underhand grip. Place forearm on padded platform. Raise bar up until wrist is fully flexed. Lower and repeat.

Lever Grip.title: Lever Grip
Lever Grip.description: Sit on seat. Grasp lever handles on each side; fingers around lever handles and base of thumbs around stationary bars. Squeeze bars together with both hands until lever makes contact with stationary bars. Lower to original position and repeat.

Lever Ulnar Deviation.title: Lever Ulnar Deviation
Lever Ulnar Deviation.description: Rotate handle over and under so handle is in slightly downward position toward thighs. Grasp handle with thumb ups grip so fist is pulled up under resistance. Bend wrist so pinky side of fist is pulled down. Return to starting position and repeat.

Lever Wrist Curl.title: Lever Wrist Curl
Lever Wrist Curl.description: Grasp bar with underhand grip to each side. Place forearms on arm pads. Raise handles up until wrist is fully flexed. Lower handles until wrists are full hyperextended. Repeat.

Lever Roller Wrist Flexion.title: Lever Roller Wrist Flexion
Lever Roller Wrist Flexion.description: Grasp wrist roller handles with both hands; over hand grip. With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack. Repeat.

Lever Roller Ulnar Deviation.title: Lever Roller Ulnar Deviation
Lever Roller Ulnar Deviation.description: Place hands on knobs at each end of roller. With left hand gripping knob, relax grip of right hand and slide grip upward so fingers are more over knob (by radial deviation) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and rotate knob with right hand so thumb travels away from body (by ulnar deviation). Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack.

Sled One Hand Grip.title: Sled One Hand Grip
Sled One Hand Grip.description: Stand in front of apparatus. Grasp bar grips with one hand; fingers around far bar and base of thumb around near stationary bar. Squeeze bar grips together until far bar makes contact with nearest bar. Release to original position and repeat.

Sled Grip (plate loaded).title: Sled Grip (plate loaded)
Sled Grip (plate loaded).description: Bend over and grasp bar grips with both hands; fingers under lower bar and base of thumbs over top stationary bar. Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.

Sled One Hand Grip (plate loaded).title: Sled One Hand Grip (plate loaded)
Sled One Hand Grip (plate loaded).description: Bend over and grasp bar grips with one hand; fingers under lower bar and base of thumb over top stationary bar. Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.

Sled One Hand Pinch Grip (plate loaded).title: Sled One Hand Pinch Grip (plate loaded)
Sled One Hand Pinch Grip (plate loaded).description: Place hand around horizontal surfaces; fingers along lower surface and thumb on upper surface. Pinch surfaces together until lower part makes contact with upper part. Release to original position or just before surfaces become too far apart. Repeat.

Barbell Reverse Wrist Curl.title: Barbell Reverse Wrist Curl
Barbell Reverse Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees. Raise barbell by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

Cable Reverse Wrist Curl.title: Cable Reverse Wrist Curl
Cable Reverse Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width overhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees. Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Reverse Wrist Curl.title: Cable One Arm Reverse Wrist Curl
Cable One Arm Reverse Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm facing down and with wrist just beyond knee. Raise stirrup by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

Cable Roller Wrist Extension.title: Cable Roller Wrist Extension
Cable Roller Wrist Extension.description: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands; over hand grip. With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip in front of handle (by flexing wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and hyperextend right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.

Dumbbell Radial Deviation.title: Dumbbell Radial Deviation
Dumbbell Radial Deviation.description: Grasp half loaded dumbbell with plate on thumb side. Position arm down to side. Bend wrist so weighted side is pulled upward. Lower until weighted side is pointing downward. Repeat.

Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl.title: Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl
Dumbbell Reverse Wrist Curl.description: Sit and grip dumbbell with overhand grip. Rest forearm on thigh with wrist just beyond knee. Raise dummbell by pointing knuckles upward as high as possible. Return until knuckles are pointing downward as far as possible. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Wrist Curl (plate loaded).title: Lever Reverse Wrist Curl (plate loaded)
Lever Reverse Wrist Curl (plate loaded).description: Grasp bar with overhand grip. Place forearm on padded platform. Raise bar until wrist is fully hyperextended and return until wrist is fully flexed. Repeat.

Lever Radial Deviation.title: Lever Radial Deviation
Lever Radial Deviation.description: Rotate handle under and over so handle is in slightly upward position toward head. Grasp handle with thumb ups grip so thumb side of fist is pulled away under resistance. Bend wrist so thumb side of fist is pulled up. Return to starting position and repeat.

Lever Reverse Wrist Curl.title: Lever Reverse Wrist Curl
Lever Reverse Wrist Curl.description: Grasp handles with overhand grip to each side. Place forearms on arm pads. Raise handles until wrist is fully hyperextended. Lower handles until wrists are fully flexed. Repeat.

Lever Roller Wrist Extension.title: Lever Roller Wrist Extension
Lever Roller Wrist Extension.description: Grasp wrist roller handle with both hands; over hand grip. With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip in front of handle (by flexing wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and hyperextend right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack. Repeat.

Lever Roller Radial Deviation.title: Lever Roller Radial Deviation
Lever Roller Radial Deviation.description: Place hands on knobs at each end of roller. With left hand gripping knob, relax grip of right hand and slide grip downward so fingers are under bottom of knob (by ulnar deviation) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and rotate knob with right hand so thumb travels closer to body (by radial deviation). Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement or loosen grip slightly to control descent of weight stack.

Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm up).title: Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm up)
Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm up).description: Lie on bench or mat. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; pinkie positioned near weighted side. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place arm on hip or side of waist. Position thumb upward (supinated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (pronation). Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm down).title: Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm down)
Dumbbell Lying Pronation (arm down).description: Grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell with thumb next to weighted side. Lie on bench on side with weight and position arm with "half dumbbell" on bench. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and tucked bent elbow under body. Position thumb down (supinated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (pronation). Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Seated Pronation.title: Dumbbell Seated Pronation
Dumbbell Seated Pronation.description: Sit next to elevated surface, approximately arm pit height. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; pinkie positioned near weighted side. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place upperarm on elevated surface. Position thumb upward (supinated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (pronation). Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Forearm Pronation.title: Lever Seated Forearm Pronation
Lever Seated Forearm Pronation.description: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with underhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads. Rotate shafts by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.

Lever Standing Forearm Pronation.title: Lever Standing Forearm Pronation
Lever Standing Forearm Pronation.description: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with underhand grip. Rotate shaft by turning palm downward. Return and repeat.

Lever Forearm Supination/Pronation.title: Lever Forearm Supination/Pronation
Lever Forearm Supination/Pronation.description: Grasp open handles with both hands Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Rotate shaft by turning palms downward. Repeat.

Dumbbell Lying Supination.title: Dumbbell Lying Supination
Dumbbell Lying Supination.description: Lie on bench or mat. With hand of upper arm, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; thumb next to side with weight. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place forearm on hip, or side of waist. Position thumb downward (pronated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (supination). Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Lying Supination (arm down).title: Dumbbell Lying Supination (arm down)
Dumbbell Lying Supination (arm down).description: Grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell with pinkie finger next to weight side. Lie on bench on side with weight and position arm with "half dumbbell" on bench. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and tuck bent elbow under body. Position thumb up (pronated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns downward (supinated). Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Seated Supination.title: Dumbbell Seated Supination
Dumbbell Seated Supination.description: Sit next to elevated surface, approximately arm pit height. With hand of arm next to elevated surface, grasp unilaterally loaded dumbbell; thumb next to side with weight. Bend elbow approximately 90-degrees and place upperarm on elevated surface. Position thumb downward (pronated). Rotate dumbbell so thumb turns upward (supination). Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Forearm Supination.title: Lever Seated Forearm Supination
Lever Seated Forearm Supination.description: Sit on seat. Grasp rotating handles with overhand grip on each side and place forearms on pads. Rotate shafts by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.

Lever Standing Forearm Supination.title: Lever Standing Forearm Supination
Lever Standing Forearm Supination.description: Grasp open handle at end of shaft with overhand grip. Rotate shaft by turning palm upward. Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Curl.title: Dumbbell Curl
Dumbbell Curl.description: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight. With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

Dumbbell Incline Curl.title: Dumbbell Incline Curl
Dumbbell Incline Curl.description: Sit back on 45-60 degree incline bench. With arms hanging down straight, position two dumbbells with palms facing inward. With elbows back to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

Machine-assisted Triceps Dip.title: Machine-assisted Triceps Dip
Machine-assisted Triceps Dip.description: Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Step down onto assistance lever. Keep hips and knees straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Machine-assisted Triceps Dip (kneeling).title: Machine-assisted Triceps Dip (kneeling)
Machine-assisted Triceps Dip (kneeling).description: Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Kneel on padded platform, lowering it down slightly so hips are slightly bent. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Barbell Close Grip Bench Press.title: Barbell Close Grip Bench Press
Barbell Close Grip Bench Press.description: Lie on bench and grasp barbell from rack with shoulder width grip. Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push barbell back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Barbell Close Grip Incline Bench Press.title: Barbell Close Grip Incline Bench Press
Barbell Close Grip Incline Bench Press.description: Lie on bench with bar above chest. Grasp bar from rack with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push barbell up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Barbell JM Bench Press.title: Barbell JM Bench Press
Barbell JM Bench Press.description: Lie on bench with back flat on bench and grasp barbell from rack with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Lower in straight line toward neck while keeping elbows relatively high and bending them out to sides, approximately 45° from midline of body. Flex wrists slightly as bar is lowered as to keep weight of bar on base of palms. Pause when forearms mak e solid contact with biceps. Push barbell back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Barbell Lying Triceps Extension.title: Barbell Lying Triceps Extension
Barbell Lying Triceps Extension.description: Lie on bench with narrow overhand grip on barbell. Position barbell over forehead with arms extended. Lower bar by bending elbows. As bar nears head, move elbows slightly back just enough to allow bar to clear around curvature of head. Extend arms. As bar clears head, reposition elbows to their former position until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Decline Triceps Extension.title: Barbell Decline Triceps Extension
Barbell Decline Triceps Extension.description: Lie on decline bench with narrow overhand grip on barbell. Position barbell over shoulders with arms extended. Lower bar by bending elbows. As bar nears head, move elbows slightly back just enough to allow bar to clear around curvature of head. Extend arms. As bar clears head, reposition elbows to its former position until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Incline Triceps Extension.title: Barbell Incline Triceps Extension
Barbell Incline Triceps Extension.description: Lie on slightly incline bench with narrow overhand grip on barbell. Position barbell over shoulders with arms extended. Lower bar by bending elbows. As bar nears head, move elbows slightly back just enough to allow bar to clear around curvature of head. Extend arms. As bar clears head, reposition elbows to their former position until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Lying Triceps Extension \"Skull.title: Barbell Lying Triceps Extension "Skull Crusher"
Barbell Lying Triceps Extension \"Skull.description: Lie on bench with narrow overhand grip on barbell. Position barbell over shoulders with arms extended. Lower bar to forehead by bending elbows. Extend arms and repeat.

Barbell Triceps Extension.title: Barbell Triceps Extension
Barbell Triceps Extension.description: Position barbell overhead with narrow overhand grip. Lower forearm behind upper arm with elbows remaining overhead. Extend forearm overhead. Lower and repeat.

Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension.title: Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension
Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension.description: Grasp cable bar from medium high pulley with narrow or shoulder width overhand grip. Turn body away from pulley apparatus and position turned cable bar behind neck. Bend over downward with cable bar positioned behind neck, gripped at each side. Lunge forward with one leg. Allow elbows to be pulled back under cable resistance. Extend forearms forward until elbows are straight. Allow cable bar to return back over neck. Repeat.

Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension (with.title: Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension (with rope attachment)
Cable Bent-over Triceps Extension (with.description: Grasp rope attachment from medium high pulley. Turn body away from pulley apparatus and position turned rope attachment behind neck. Bend over downward with rope attachment positioned behind neck gripped at each side. Lunge forward with one leg. Allow elbows to be pulled back under cable resistance. Extend forearms forward until elbows are straight. Allow cable bar to return back over neck. Repeat.

Cable Forward Triceps Extension.title: Cable Forward Triceps Extension
Cable Forward Triceps Extension.description: Grasp stirrup from medium high pulley. Turn body away from pulley apparatus and position stirrup over shoulder with palms down. Step forward with one foot so cable is taut. Position elbow forward about shoulder height. Push stirrup forward by extending forearm until elbow is straight. Allow stirrup to return back over shoulder. Repeat and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Incline Triceps Extension.title: Cable Incline Triceps Extension
Cable Incline Triceps Extension.description: Grasp cable bar from behind with narrow overhand grip. Position elbows overhead. Extend forearm overhead until elbows are straight. Lower until forearms are against upper arms. Repeat.

Cable Kneeling Triceps Extension.title: Cable Kneeling Triceps Extension
Cable Kneeling Triceps Extension.description: Grasp cable bar from middle pulley with narrow or shoulder width overhand grip. Turn body away from pulley apparatus with cable bar above head. Kneel before bench, bend over and place elbows on edge of bench. Maintain upper arms parallel with shoulders as low as possible. Extend forearms over head until elbow are fully extended. Return and repeat.

Cable Lying Triceps Extension.title: Cable Lying Triceps Extension
Cable Lying Triceps Extension.description: Lie on bench and grasp bar with narrow overhand grip. With arms extended, position bar over forehead. Lower bar by bending elbow. As bar nears head, move elbows slightly back just enough to allow bar to clear around curvature of head. Extend arm. As bar clears head, reposition elbows to its former position until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Decline Triceps Extension.title: Cable Decline Triceps Extension
Cable Decline Triceps Extension.description: Position legs under lower leg pad and lie back on bench. Grasp bar with narrow overhand grip. Position bar near forehead or top of head. Extend elbows to raise bar attachment until arms are straight. As arms extended, position them vertically. Lower bar by bending elbows. As bar nears head, reposition elbows back just enough to allow bar to clear around curvature of head. Repeat.

Cable Pushdown.title: Cable Pushdown
Cable Pushdown.description: Face high pulley and grasp cable attachment with narrow overhand grip. Position elbows to side. Extend arms down. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat.

Cable Alternating Seated Pushdown.title: Cable Alternating Seated Pushdown
Cable Alternating Seated Pushdown.description: Sit on seat or bench in font of two close high pulleys. Grasp stirrup with each hand (over or underhand grip). Position elbows to side. Push one stirrup down by extending elbow until arm is straight. Return until forearm returns to original positon, keeping elbow close to side. Repeat with opposite arm and alternate.

Cable Bar Pushdown.title: Cable Bar Pushdown
Cable Bar Pushdown.description: Position adjustable pulleys slightly above head. Face cable bar and grasp with overhand narrow grip. Position elbows to side. Extend arms down. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat.
