Cable Pushdown (forward leaning).title: Cable Pushdown (forward leaning)
Cable Pushdown (forward leaning).description: Face high pulley and grasp revolving bar cable attachment with overhand grip. Position one leg back and bend forward leg with body leaning forward. Position revolving bar down in front of face with forearms nearing vertical. Push cable bar downward by extending arms until elbows are straight. Return to front of face until forearms are nearly vertical and close to upper arm. Repeat.

Cable Incline Pushdown.title: Cable Incline Pushdown
Cable Incline Pushdown.description: Lie on incline bench facing away from high pulley. Grasp cable attachment overhead with overhand narrow grip. Position elbow to sides, slightly up. Extend arms with elbows stationary. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Pushdown.title: Cable One Arm Pushdown
Cable One Arm Pushdown.description: Grasp dumbbell cable attachment with underhand grip. Position elbow to side. Extend arm down. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Pushdown (with back support).title: Cable Pushdown (with back support)
Cable Pushdown (with back support).description: Place back against vertical back support. Grasp cable attachment from high pulley with narrow overhand grip. Position elbows to side. Extend arms down. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat.

Cable Pushdown (with rope attachment).title: Cable Pushdown (with rope attachment)
Cable Pushdown (with rope attachment).description: Face high pulley and grasp rope attachment with clinched hands side by side (palms in). Position elbows to side. Extend arms down. Turn palms down at bottom. Return until forearm is close to upper arm and hands are in original position. Repeat.

Cable Pushdown (with V-bar).title: Cable Pushdown (with V-bar)
Cable Pushdown (with V-bar).description: Face high pulley and grasp V-bar attachment with narrow overhand grip. Position elbows to side. Extend arms down. Return until forearm is close to upper arm. Repeat.

Cable Side Triceps Extension.title: Cable Side Triceps Extension
Cable Side Triceps Extension.description: Grasp stirrup from medium high pulley. Turn body so pulley is to side of free arm while lifting stirrup over head. Step forward, just slightly to allow stirrup to be placed behind head, just over shoulder. Place elbow just slightly higher than shoulder height and position palm down. Push stirrup out to side by extending forearm until elbow is straight. Allow stirrup to return back over shoulder. Repeat and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Triceps Dip.title: Cable Triceps Dip
Cable Triceps Dip.description: Step between shoulder width dip bars with dip belt around waist. Kneel as close to low pulley and attach cable to dip belt. Stand up and mount dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight. Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Cable Triceps Extension.title: Cable Triceps Extension
Cable Triceps Extension.description: Stand or sit on bench or seat with back support just below shoulders. Position cable bar behind neck or shoulders with narrow overhand grip. Position elbows over head. Extend forearm overhead until arms are straight. Lower until forearms are against upper arms. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (pronate.title: Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (pronated grip)
Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (pronate.description: Grasp stirrup cable attachment from behind. Place hand with cable behind neck; palm toward neck and elbow positioned upward. Extend arm upward. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (supinat.title: Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (supinated grip)
Cable One Arm Triceps Extension (supinat.description: Grasp stirrup cable attachment from behind. Place hand with cable behind neck; palm toward neck and elbow positioned upward. Extend arm upward. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Triceps Extension (with rope).title: Cable Triceps Extension (with rope)
Cable Triceps Extension (with rope).description: From low pulley cable, grasp ends of rope attachment just under enlarged ends. Raise one arm over head while turning body away from pulley. Face away from pulley with feet staggered. Position ends of ropes behind head or neck and elbows upward over head. Raise ends of rope overhead by extending forearms until arms are straight. Lower rope attachment until forearms are against upper arms. Repeat.

Dumbbell Kickback.title: Dumbbell Kickback
Dumbbell Kickback.description: Kneel over bench with arm supporting body. Grasp dumbbell. Position upper arm parallel to floor. Extend arm until it is straight. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Lying Triceps Extension.title: Dumbbell Lying Triceps Extension
Dumbbell Lying Triceps Extension.description: Lie on bench and position dumbbells over head with arms extended. Lower dumbbells by bending elbow until they are to sides of head. Extend arm. Repeat.

Dumbbell Decline Triceps Extension.title: Dumbbell Decline Triceps Extension
Dumbbell Decline Triceps Extension.description: Lie on decline bench and position dumbbells over shoulders with arms extended. Lower dumbbells by bending elbow until they are to sides of head; dumbbells touch shoulder. Extend arm. Repeat.

Dumbbell Incline Triceps Extension.title: Dumbbell Incline Triceps Extension
Dumbbell Incline Triceps Extension.description: Lie supine on incline bench with back of head on upper corner of bench. Position dumbbells over head with arms extended. Lower dumbbells by bending elbow until they are to sides of head. Extend arm and repeat.

Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension.title: Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension
Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension.description: Sit on seat with back support just below shoulder height. Position dumbbell over head with arm straight up or slightly back. Lower dumbbell behind neck or shoulder while maintaining upper arm's vertical position throughout exercise. Extend arm until straight. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension (on b.title: Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension (on bench)
Dumbbell One Arm Triceps Extension (on b.description: Position dumbbell behind neck with elbow positioned upward. Extend arm until straight while maintaining upper arm's vertical position throughout exercise. Return until dumbbell is behind neck or shoulder and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Triceps Extension.title: Dumbbell Triceps Extension
Dumbbell Triceps Extension.description: Position one dumbbell over head with both hands under inner plate (heart shaped grip). With elbows over head, lower forearm behind upper arm by flexing elbows. Flex wrists at bottom to avoid hitting dumbbell on back of neck. Raise dumbbell over head by extending elbows while hyperextending wrists. Return and repeat.

Lever Close Grip Bench Press (plate load.title: Lever Close Grip Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Close Grip Bench Press (plate load.description: Lie on bench with lever handles above sides of chest. Grasp handles with narrow overhand grip just above each side of chest. Press lever up until arms are extended. Return weights down to starting position. Repeat.

Lever Barbell Close Grip Bench Press (pl.title: Lever Barbell Close Grip Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Close Grip Bench Press (pl.description: Lie on bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push barbell back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Lever Triceps Extension (plate loaded).title: Lever Triceps Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Triceps Extension (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat. Place forearms on lever pad and back of upper arms, parallel on padding with elbows in line with lever's fulcrum. Push lever down until arms are fully extended. Return and repeat.

Lever Triceps Extension (no seat, plate.title: Lever Triceps Extension (no seat, plate loaded)
Lever Triceps Extension (no seat, plate.description: Stand behind arm pad facing lever handles. Place one foot forward under arm pad and opposite foot back on foot bar. Grasp handles with narrow overhand grip. Squat down and position chest up against side of pad and back of upper arms on upper angled padded surface. Push lever down until arms are fully extended. Return and repeat.

Lever Triceps Dip (plate loaded).title: Lever Triceps Dip (plate loaded)
Lever Triceps Dip (plate loaded).description: Sit upright on seat. If possible, place handles in narrow position. Grasp handles. Push levers down with elbows pointing back. Allow lever bar to raise until shoulders are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Incline Triceps Extension.title: Lever Incline Triceps Extension
Lever Incline Triceps Extension.description: Sit on seat and lie back on back support. Push foot lever down with foot and grasp lever handles from behind. With lever handles behind head, place both feet on support or floor. Push lever handles up over head until arms are fully extended. Return and repeat.

Lever Overhead Triceps Extension.title: Lever Overhead Triceps Extension
Lever Overhead Triceps Extension.description: Sit on seat. Push foot lever down with foot and grasp lever handles from behind. With lever handles behind neck, place both feet on support or floor. Push lever handles up over head until arms are fully extended. Return and repeat.

Lever Pushdown.title: Lever Pushdown
Lever Pushdown.description: Sit on seat and grasp handles by shoulders. Position elbows to sides. Push lever down beyond hips until arm is fully extended. Return and repeat.

Lever Seated Close Grip Press.title: Lever Seated Close Grip Press
Lever Seated Close Grip Press.description: Sit on seat with chest at height of handles. Grasp handles with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip, just against sides of chest; elbows somewhat down to sides. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until forearm is against upper arm. Repeat.

Lever Close Grip Incline Bench Press.title: Lever Close Grip Incline Bench Press
Lever Close Grip Incline Bench Press.description: Lie on incline bench with parallel lever bars close to sides of chest. Grasp handles with shoulder width grip. Press lever until arms are ext ended. Return weight until wrists are at side of chest. Repeat.

Lever Triceps Dip.title: Lever Triceps Dip
Lever Triceps Dip.description: If possible, place handles in narrow position. Sit on seat with legs under pads. Grasp handles and position elbows back. Push levers down by straightening arms downward. Allow lever bar to raise with elbows pointing back until shoulders are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Overhand Triceps Dip.title: Lever Overhand Triceps Dip
Lever Overhand Triceps Dip.description: Sit on seat with back against pad. Gra sp end of handles with overhand grip and position elbows back. Push levers down by straightening arms downward. Allow lever bar to raise with elbows pointing back until shoulders are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Triceps Extension.title: Lever Triceps Extension
Lever Triceps Extension.description: Sit on seat with arm pads apart to sides. Slide arm pads closer together to sides of the chest. Grasp handles and places back of upper arms on padding. Push the lever down until arms are fully extended. Return until forearms contact upper arms. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Triceps Extension.title: Lever Alternating Triceps Extension
Lever Alternating Triceps Extension.description: Sit on seat. Grasp handles and place back of upper arms on padding. Push one lever out and down until arm is fully extended. Return until forearm contacts upper arm. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

Sled Standing Triceps Dip.title: Sled Standing Triceps Dip
Sled Standing Triceps Dip.description: Stand between handles facing machine. Grasp parallel handles and position elbows back. Squat down slightly by bending hips and knees, just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack. Push levers down by straightening arms downward. Allow lever bar to raise with elbows pointing back until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

Smith Close Grip Bench Press.title: Smith Close Grip Bench Press
Smith Close Grip Bench Press.description: Lie on bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Smith Close Grip Incline Bench Press.title: Smith Close Grip Incline Bench Press
Smith Close Grip Incline Bench Press.description: Lie on incline bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Weighted Bench Dip.title: Weighted Bench Dip
Weighted Bench Dip.description: Sit on inside of one of two benches placed parallel, slightly less than leg's length away. Place hands on edge of bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench and position heels on adjacent bench with legs straight. Have assistant place weight on lap near hips. Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

Weighted Close Grip Push-up.title: Weighted Close Grip Push-up
Weighted Close Grip Push-up.description: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight. Partner can place weight plate(s) on back if needed. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Weighted Triceps Dip.title: Weighted Triceps Dip
Weighted Triceps Dip.description: Place weight on dip belt around waist or place dumbbell between lower legs just above feet. Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Band-assisted Triceps Dip.title: Band-assisted Triceps Dip
Band-assisted Triceps Dip.description: Place one foot on middle of exercise band with ends looped on shoulder width dip bars. Push band down partially by extending leg. Mount\xa0dip bar with arms straight and shoulders above hands. Place other foot on exercise band next to other foot. Keep hips straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Bench Dip.title: Bench Dip
Bench Dip.description: Sit on inside of one of two benches placed parallel, slightly less than leg's length away. Place hands on edge of bench, straighten arms, slide rear end off of bench, and position heels on adjacent bench with legs straight. Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

Bench Dip (knees bent).title: Bench Dip (knees bent)
Bench Dip (knees bent).description: Sit on side of bench. Place hands on edge of bench. Place feet on floor away from bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench, and position feet on floor with knees bent. Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

Bench Dip (heels on floor).title: Bench Dip (heels on floor)
Bench Dip (heels on floor).description: Sit on side of bench. Place hands on edge of bench. Position feet away from bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench, and rest heels on floor with legs straight. Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.

Close Grip Push-up.title: Close Grip Push-up
Close Grip Push-up.description: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Close Grip Push-up (on knees).title: Close Grip Push-up (on knees)
Close Grip Push-up (on knees).description: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Close Grip Push-up (on medicine ball).title: Close Grip Push-up (on medicine ball)
Close Grip Push-up (on medicine ball).description: Kneel before medicine ball. Place hands on upper part of ball on each side. Balance upper body above ball with arms extended. Straighten body and place forefeet back, away from ball on floor shoulder width apart. Keeping body straight, lower body by bending arms until chest touches ball. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Close Grip Incline Push-up (on bar).title: Close Grip Incline Push-up (on bar)
Close Grip Incline Push-up (on bar).description: Grasp horizontal bar (lower than chest height) with hands shoulder width or slightly narrower. Position forefeet back from bar with arms and body straight. Arms should be perpendicular to body. Keeping body straight, lower chest to bar by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Suspended Triceps Extension (with rope).title: Suspended Triceps Extension (with rope)
Suspended Triceps Extension (with rope).description: Grasp triceps rope hanging from secured bar (chest height or lower). Position forefeet on floor, back from bar with body straight. Elbows can be either be completely bent or straight during mount with upper arms somewhat perpendicular with body. Keeping body straight, raise body up and back up until arms are extended. Lower body by bending elbows, allowing head to travel between ends of rope. Repeat.

Triceps Dip.title: Triceps Dip
Triceps Dip.description: Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Triceps Dip (between benches).title: Triceps Dip (between benches)
Triceps Dip (between benches).description: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off end of benches. Grip should be somewhat narrow. Position feet out in front with legs straight, heels on floor, and torso upright. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to point back. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Triceps Dip (bent knees between benches).title: Triceps Dip (bent knees between benches)
Triceps Dip (bent knees between benches).description: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off ends of benches. Grip should be somewhat narrow. Position feet in front with legs bent and torso upright. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to point back. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Suspended Triceps Dip.title: Suspended Triceps Dip
Suspended Triceps Dip.description: Stand between two suspension handles and grasp handles on each side of torso. Hold position firmly and lift feet from floor. Push body up until arms are straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

Suspended Self-assisted Triceps Dip.title: Suspended Self-assisted Triceps Dip
Suspended Self-assisted Triceps Dip.description: Stand between two suspension handles, approximately mid-thigh height. Grasp handles on each side and straighten arms with shoulders above hands. Holding position firmly and place bodyweight on handles. Place toes on floor behind with knees bent and feet back. Lower body by bending arms back. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees to bend, keeping toes in contact with floor. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up back up until arms are straight. Repeat with minimal assistance from legs.

Suspended Triceps Extension.title: Suspended Triceps Extension
Suspended Triceps Extension.description: Grasp handles and step forward between suspension trainers. Position arms downward and slightly forward, nearly parallel with suspension straps. Lean forward, placing upper body weight onto handles with arms straight, while stepping back onto forefeet so body is leaning forward at desired angle. Straighten body, so torso is in-line with legs. Lower body by bending elbows, allowing head to travel between suspension handles. Raise body up and back up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Self-assisted Triceps Dip.title: Self-assisted Triceps Dip
Self-assisted Triceps Dip.description: Stand on bench or elevation between parallel bars. Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Bend knees and place toes on bench or elevation behind and below body. Lower body by bending arms back. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees to bend, keeping toes in contact with bench or elevation. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders push body up until arms are straight. Repeat with minimal assistance from legs.

Barbell Curl.title: Barbell Curl
Barbell Curl.description: Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Drag Curl.title: Barbell Drag Curl
Barbell Drag Curl.description: Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise barbell straight up so elbows travel back as elbows flex. Follow contour of hips and waist. As elbows continues to flex, begin bringing elbows forward when forearms rises past horizontal position. Continue upward over chest until forearms are perpendicular. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Alternating Curl.title: Cable Alternating Curl
Cable Alternating Curl.description: Stand between or facing double low pulleys. Grasp stirrups to each side, palms facing forward. Pull one stirrup up forward and upward toward shoulder while keeping elbow stationary. Return until arm is fully extended. Repeat on other arm, alternating between sides.

Cable Alternating Seated Curl.title: Cable Alternating Seated Curl
Cable Alternating Seated Curl.description: Sit on seat situated between two low pulleys down to each side. Grasp stirrups in each hand, palms facing forward. Pull one stirrup up toward shoulder while keeping elbow stationary. Return until arm is fully extended. Repeat with other arm, alternating between sides.

Cable Curl.title: Cable Curl
Cable Curl.description: Grasp low pulley cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Stand close to pulley. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Bar Curl.title: Cable Bar Curl
Cable Bar Curl.description: Grasp low cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Stand close to cable bar. With elbows to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Curl (with stirrups).title: Cable Curl (with stirrups)
Cable Curl (with stirrups).description: Stand between or facing double low pulleys. Grasp stirrups to each side, palms facing forward. Pull stirrups forward and upward toward shoulders while keeping elbows stationary. Return until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Seated Curl.title: Cable Seated Curl
Cable Seated Curl.description: Sit on seat situated between two low pulleys down to each side. Grasp stirrups in each hand, palms facing forward. Pull both stirrups up toward shoulders while keeping elbows stationary. Return until arms are fully extended and repeat.

Cable One Arm Curl.title: Cable One Arm Curl
Cable One Arm Curl.description: Face low pulley and grasp stirrup cable attachment to one side with underhand grip. With elbow to side, raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Supine Curl.title: Cable Supine Curl
Cable Supine Curl.description: Sit on floor with feet or heels against pulley machine. Grasp low pulley cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Lie back on floor with arms to sides. With elbows to side, pull bar until elbows are flexed. Lower until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Dumbbell Curl.title: Dumbbell Curl
Dumbbell Curl.description: Position two dumbbells to sides, palms facing in, arms straight. With elbows to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

Dumbbell Incline Curl.title: Dumbbell Incline Curl
Dumbbell Incline Curl.description: Sit back on 45-60 degree incline bench. With arms hanging down straight, position two dumbbells with palms facing inward. With elbows back to sides, raise one dumbbell and rotate forearm until forearm is vertical and palm faces shoulder. Lower to original position and repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate between sides.

Lever Curl.title: Lever Curl
Lever Curl.description: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip. Raise lever handles until elbows are fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handles until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Curl.title: Lever Alternating Curl
Lever Alternating Curl.description: Sit on seat and grasp handles with underhand grip. Raise lever on handle until elbow is fully flexed with back of upper arm remaining on pad. Lower handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate movement between sides.

Chin-up.title: Chin-up
Chin-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Underhand Inverted Row.title: Underhand Inverted Row
Underhand Inverted Row.description: Lay on back under fixed horizontal bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Underhand Inverted Row (high bar).title: Underhand Inverted Row (high bar)
Underhand Inverted Row (high bar).description: Stand facing arms length away from waist to head height horizontal bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Position body under bar with legs, hips and spine straight. Arms should be straight, approximately perpendicular to body. Heels should make contact with floor with feet about perpendicular to legs. Keeping body straight, pull body up to bar. Return until arms are extended and shoulders are stretched forward. Repeat.

Suspended Arm Curl.title: Suspended Arm Curl
Suspended Arm Curl.description: Grasp suspension handles and momentarily step back until arms are extended forward and straight. While keeping arms straight and shoulders back, step forward so body is reclined back. Position palms up or slightly inward. Bring handles toward shoulders by flexing arms, while keeping elbows pointed forward. Return by straightening arms and repeat.

Barbell Preacher Curl.title: Barbell Preacher Curl
Barbell Preacher Curl.description: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Standing Preacher Curl.title: Barbell Standing Preacher Curl
Barbell Standing Preacher Curl.description: Placing back of arms on pad with one foot forward, grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise bar until forearms are vertical. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Barbell Prone Incline Curl.title: Barbell Prone Incline Curl
Barbell Prone Incline Curl.description: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. From low rack or partner, grasp curl bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise bar until arms are flexed. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Concentration Curl.title: Cable Concentration Curl
Cable Concentration Curl.description: Facing low pulley cable, sit on seat or bench with legs apart to each side. Grasp stirrup attachment. Place upper arm against inner thigh. Pull stirrup to front of shoulder until elbow is completely flexed. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Preacher Curl.title: Cable Preacher Curl
Cable Preacher Curl.description: Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Alternating Preacher Curl.title: Cable Alternating Preacher Curl
Cable Alternating Preacher Curl.description: Grasp cable stirrups with each hand. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad with palms up. Raise one stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating between arms.

Cable Standing Preacher Curl.title: Cable Standing Preacher Curl
Cable Standing Preacher Curl.description: Stand behind preacher bench. Grasp cable bar with shoulder width underhand grip. Position back of arms on pad. Raise cable bar toward shoulders. Lower cable bar until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Standing Preacher Curl.title: Cable One Arm Standing Preacher Curl
Cable One Arm Standing Preacher Curl.description: Standing behind standing preacher bench and grasp cable stirrup. Place back of arm on pad with palm up. Raise stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Preacher Curl.title: Cable One Arm Preacher Curl
Cable One Arm Preacher Curl.description: Grasp cable stirrup. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arm on pad with palm up. Raise stirrup upward toward shoulder of same arm. Lower stirrup until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Preacher Curl (stirrups).title: Cable Preacher Curl (stirrups)
Cable Preacher Curl (stirrups).description: Grasp cable stirrups with each hand. Sit on preacher bench placing back of arms on pad with palms up. Raise both stirrups upward toward shoulders. Lower stirrups until arm is fully extended. Repeat.

Cable Prone Incline Curl.title: Cable Prone Incline Curl
Cable Prone Incline Curl.description: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. Grasp cable attachment with shoulder width underhand grip. Raise bar until arms are flexed. Lower barbell until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Dumbbell Concentration Curl.title: Dumbbell Concentration Curl
Dumbbell Concentration Curl.description: Sit on bench. Grasp dumbbell between feet. Place back of upper arm to inner thigh. Lean into leg to raise elbow slightly. Raise dumbbell to front of shoulder. Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Preacher Curl.title: Dumbbell Preacher Curl
Dumbbell Preacher Curl.description: Grasp dumbbell and sit on preacher bench. With arm bent and palm facing shoulder, place back of arm down on pad. Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Raise dumbbell until forearm is vertical. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Standing Preacher Curl.title: Dumbbell Standing Preacher Curl
Dumbbell Standing Preacher Curl.description: With dummbell in hand, arm bent, and palm facing shoulder, place back of arm on pad. Lower dumbbell until arm is fully extended. Raise dumbbell until forearm is vertical. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Prone Incline Curl.title: Dumbbell Prone Incline Curl
Dumbbell Prone Incline Curl.description: Lie prone on incline bench with shoulders near top of incline. Knees can rest on seat or legs can be straddled to sides. From elevated platform or partner, grasp dumbbell and position palms forward. Raise dumbbells until arms are flexed. Lower dumbbells until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Preacher Curl (plate loaded).title: Lever Preacher Curl (plate loaded)
Lever Preacher Curl (plate loaded).description: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever. Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Preacher Curl (arms high, plate lo.title: Lever Preacher Curl (arms high, plate loaded)
Lever Preacher Curl (arms high, plate lo.description: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads. Pull lever handles toward shoulders. Return handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms hi.title: Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms high, plate loaded)
Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms hi.description: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads. Pull one lever handle toward shoulder. Return handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

Lever Preacher Curl (no seat, plate load.title: Lever Preacher Curl (no seat, plate loaded)
Lever Preacher Curl (no seat, plate load.description: Stand behind arm pad and face lever handles on opposite side. Place one foot forward under arm pad and opposite foot back on foot bar. Lean over arm pads and grasp handles with slightly narrower than shoulder width underhand grip. Squat down and position back of upper arms on arm pads. Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Preacher Curl.title: Lever Preacher Curl
Lever Preacher Curl.description: Sit on curl machine placing back of arms on pad. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever. Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Preacher Curl (arms high).title: Lever Preacher Curl (arms high)
Lever Preacher Curl (arms high).description: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads. Pull lever handles toward shoulders. Return handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms hi.title: Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms high)
Lever Alternating Preacher Curl (arms hi.description: Sit on curl machine. Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Align elbows at same pivot point as fulcrum of lever while placing back of arms up on pads. Pull one lever handle toward shoulder. Return handle until arm is fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue alternating movement between arms.

Lever Preacher Curl (no seat).title: Lever Preacher Curl (no seat)
Lever Preacher Curl (no seat).description: Stand behind arm pad and face lever handles on opposite side. Place one foot forward under arm pad and opposite foot back on foot bar. Lean over arm pads and grasp handles with slightly narrower than shoulder width underhand grip. Squat down and position back of upper arms on arm pads. Raise lever handles toward shoulders. Lower handles until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Machine-assisted Chest Dip.title: Machine-assisted Chest Dip
Machine-assisted Chest Dip.description: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Step down onto assistance lever with hips and knees bent. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Machine-assisted Chest Dip (kneeling).title: Machine-assisted Chest Dip (kneeling)
Machine-assisted Chest Dip (kneeling).description: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Kneel on padded platform, lowering it down slightly so hips are slightly bent. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Barbell Bench Press.title: Barbell Bench Press
Barbell Bench Press.description: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip. Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Bench Press (power lift).title: Barbell Bench Press (power lift)
Barbell Bench Press (power lift).description: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Lower weight to lower chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Board Press.title: Barbell Board Press
Barbell Board Press.description: Lie supine on bench. Grasp bar with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Arch back, extend hips, and position feet back flat on floor. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Have assistant hold board on center of chest. Lower weight toward lower chest on to board. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Floor Press.title: Barbell Floor Press
Barbell Floor Press.description: Lie supine on floor at base of power rack. Place feet on floor with knees bent. Grasp bar from rack with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Lower weight to lower chest until the triceps are completely on the floor. Relax momentarily, then press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Guillotine Bench Press.title: Barbell Guillotine Bench Press
Barbell Guillotine Bench Press.description: Lie supine on bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip. Lower weight to neck to upper chest. Upper arms will be perpendicular to torso. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Bench Press (with chains).title: Barbell Bench Press (with chains)
Barbell Bench Press (with chains).description: Lie supine on bench. Grasp barbell loaded with thick chains from each side, with overhand and slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Dismount barbell from rack over chest. Lower weight to chest. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Repeat.

Barbell Decline Bench Press.title: Barbell Decline Bench Press
Barbell Decline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace. Dismount barbell from rack over chest using wide oblique overhand grip. Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Cable Chest Dip.title: Cable Chest Dip
Cable Chest Dip.description: Step between wide dip bars with dip belt around waist. Kneel as close as possible to low pulley and attach cable to dip belt. Stand up and mount dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips and knees bent. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight and repeat.

Cable Decline Fly.title: Cable Decline Fly
Cable Decline Fly.description: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Lie supine on decline bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Bring cable stirrups together above upper abdomen in hugging motion; elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

Cable Lying Fly.title: Cable Lying Fly
Cable Lying Fly.description: Grasp two opposing low pulley stirrup attachments. Lie supine on bench, in middle and perpendicular to both pulleys. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position and shoulders internally rotated so elbows are to sides. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

Cable Seated Fly.title: Cable Seated Fly
Cable Seated Fly.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Keeping elbows pointed high, bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Return to starting position until slight stretch. Repeat.

Cable Standing Fly.title: Cable Standing Fly
Cable Standing Fly.description: Grasp two opposing high pulley dumbbell attachments. Stand with pulleys to each side. Bend over slightly by flexing hips and knees. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back initially. Bring cable attachments together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Cable Bench Press.title: Cable Bench Press
Cable Bench Press.description: Lie on bench and grasp stirrups attached to low cable pulley on each side. Position stirrups out to each side of chest with bent arm under each wrist. Push stirrups up over each shoulder until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

Cable Bar Bench Press.title: Cable Bar Bench Press
Cable Bar Bench Press.description: Position adjustable pulley higher than intended height but within arms reach from bench. Position bench under cable bar. Lie supine on bench. While lying on bench, reach over and lower each pulley into intended position so that cables are taut in lowest position with bar on chest. Grasp bar with both hands using wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Lower bar to chest or until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Chest Press.title: Cable Chest Press
Cable Chest Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms. Push stirrups out straight until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Chest Press.title: Cable One Arm Chest Press
Cable One Arm Chest Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbows out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arm. Push stirrups out straight in front of shoulder until arm is straight. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt through shoulder or chest. Repeat.

Cable Standing Chest Press.title: Cable Standing Chest Press
Cable Standing Chest Press.description: Stand between two shoulder height pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups to sides of chest with elbows out to sides. Position forearms horizontally and parallel with hands elbow width. Step forward in lunging posture (one foot in front and other foot behind). Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg. Push stirrups forward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Bar Standing Chest Press.title: Cable Bar Standing Chest Press
Cable Bar Standing Chest Press.description: Stand facing behind cable bar, mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward leg. Push cable bar forward until arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Twisting Chest Press.title: Cable Twisting Chest Press
Cable Twisting Chest Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup to one side. Position elbow out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand slightly narrower than elbow width, in front of upper arm. Lean forward in seat. Push stirrup out in front of upper chest while turning torso away from pulley. Return stirrup and torso back to original position allowing torso to rotate back until slight stretch is felt through chest, shoulder or waist. Repeat.

Cable Decline Chest Press.title: Cable Decline Chest Press
Cable Decline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands slightly narrower than elbow width in front of upper arms. Push stirrups forward and slightly downward until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in shoulders or chest. Repeat.

Cable Bar Standing Decline Chest Press.title: Cable Bar Standing Decline Chest Press
Cable Bar Standing Decline Chest Press.description: Stand facing behind cable bar mounted on each side to shoulder height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar chest height with elbows angled behind and above. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward knee. Push cable bar forward and downward until bar is about hip height and arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Standing Decline Chest Press.title: Cable Standing Decline Chest Press
Cable Standing Decline Chest Press.description: Stand between two high pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position stirrups down to sides of lower chest with elbows high out to sides. Angle forearms downward with hands elbow width or slightly narrower. Lean and step forward with forward leg bent or stand feet side by side with both legs slightly bent (as shown). Push stirrups at forward/downward angle until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Twisting Standing Chest Press.title: Cable Twisting Standing Chest Press
Cable Twisting Standing Chest Press.description: Grasp cable stirrup from chest height pulley. Turn body away from pulley. Position elbow of loaded arm out to side, lower chest height. Position loaded hand back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Step far forward with foot of opposite side of loaded arm. Bend knees and position heel off rear foot off floor. Push stirrups away from body, horizontally until arm is straight and inline with cable. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Bench Press.title: Dumbbell Bench Press
Dumbbell Bench Press.description: Sit down on bench with dumbbells resting on lower thigh. Kick weights to shoulder and lie back. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell. Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

Dumbbell Decline Bench Press.title: Dumbbell Decline Bench Press
Dumbbell Decline Bench Press.description: Sit down on decline bench with feet under leg brace and dumbbells resting on thigh. Lie back with dumbbells. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with bent arm under each dumbbell. Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

Dumbbell Decline Fly.title: Dumbbell Decline Fly
Dumbbell Decline Fly.description: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on decline bench. Support dumbbells above upper abdomen with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are to sides. Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

Dumbbell Fly.title: Dumbbell Fly
Dumbbell Fly.description: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on bench. Support dumbbells above chest with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides. Lower dumbbells to sides until chest muscles are stretched with elbows fixed in slightly bent position. Bring dumbbells together in wide hugging motion until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

Dumbbell Pullover.title: Dumbbell Pullover
Dumbbell Pullover.description: Lie on upper back perpendicular to bench. Flex hips slightly. Grasp one dumbbell from behind or from side with both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Position dumbbell over chest with elbows slightly bent. Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

Dumbbell Pullover (on apparatus).title: Dumbbell Pullover (on apparatus)
Dumbbell Pullover (on apparatus).description: Sit on lower pad with back against upper pad, facing dumbbell in rack. Position feet under padded bars. Grasp dumbbell by handle with both hands. Pull top of dumbbell to chest. Push dumbbell up over chest with both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Raise hips up from pad and recline torso back so chest faces upward. Keep hips and elbows slightly bent. Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

Dumbbell Pullover (on arched bench).title: Dumbbell Pullover (on arched bench)
Dumbbell Pullover (on arched bench).description: Sit on seat of arched bench with dumbbell on lower thigh. Kick dumbbell up to shoulder while lying back on bench. Grasp both hands under inner plate of dumbbell. Position dumbbell over chest with elbows slightly bent. Keeping elbows slightly bent throughout movement, lower dumbbell over and beyond head until upper arms are in-line with torso. Pull dumbbell up and over chest. Repeat.

Lever Bench Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Bench Press (plate loaded).description: Lie supine on bench with chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Barbell Bench Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Bench Press (plate loaded).description: Lie supine on bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar. Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Lever Chest Dip (plate loaded).title: Lever Chest Dip (plate loaded)
Lever Chest Dip (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat and grasp handles with oblique grip. If possible, place handles in wide position. Lean forward slightly. Push lever down with elbows away from body. Return until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Chest Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Chest Press (plate loaded)
Lever Chest Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Press levers until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Decline Chest Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Decline Chest Press (plate loaded)
Lever Decline Chest Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Wide Grip Chest Press (plate loade.title: Lever Wide Grip Chest Press (plate loaded)
Lever Wide Grip Chest Press (plate loade.description: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip and elbows out to sides. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Chest Dip.title: Lever Chest Dip
Lever Chest Dip.description: If possible, place handles in wide position. Sit on seat and grasp handles with oblique grip. Lean forward slightly and allow elbows to flare out. Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Bent-over Fly (on iron cross machi.title: Lever Bent-over Fly (on iron cross machine)
Lever Bent-over Fly (on iron cross machi.description: Stand on platform in front of Lever Iron Cross Machine. Grasp handles to each side. Bend over at hips with knees and elbows bent slightly. Internally rotate shoulders so elbows are pointing upward. Bring lever handles together in hugging motion with elbows in fixed position. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Seated Decline Fly (gripless).title: Lever Seated Decline Fly (gripless)
Lever Seated Decline Fly (gripless).description: Sit on seat with back against seat. Position both arms over back of padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders, wrists are slightly lower than elbows. Bring padded levers together by pushing pads forward and downward in hugging motion. Return to starting position until chests muscle are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Lying Fly.title: Lever Lying Fly
Lever Lying Fly.description: Lie supine on bench. Position both arms under padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Bring padded levers upward and together in hugging motion. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Pec Deck Fly.title: Lever Pec Deck Fly
Lever Pec Deck Fly.description: Sit on machine with back on pad. If available, push foot lever until padded lever moves forward. Place forearms on padded lever. Position upper arms approximately parallel. Release foot lever. Push levers together. Return until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Decline Pec Deck Fly.title: Lever Decline Pec Deck Fly
Lever Decline Pec Deck Fly.description: Sit on machine with back on pad. If available, push foot lever until padded lever moves forward. Place forearms on padded lever. Position upper arms approximately parallel. Release foot lever. Push levers together. Return until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Seated Fly.title: Lever Seated Fly
Lever Seated Fly.description: Sit on machine with back on pad. Grasp handles to both sides, shoulder height. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Keeping elbows pointed high, push lever handles forward and together. Return to back toward original position until mild stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

Lever Seated Fly (gripless).title: Lever Seated Fly (gripless)
Lever Seated Fly (gripless).description: Sit on seat with back against pad and feet on foot bar. Position both arms behind padded levers. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are pointed back. Bring padded levers forward and together in hugging motion. Return to starting position until stretch in chests or shoulder is felt. Repeat.

Lever Seated Iron Cross Fly.title: Lever Seated Iron Cross Fly
Lever Seated Iron Cross Fly.description: Straddle seat with both levers positioned slightly above horizontal. Grasp both lever ends with elbows slightly above levers. Sit down near end of seat with torso leaning forward slightly and slightly bent elbows pointing back. Push levers downward and together in hugging motion. Keep shoulders internally rotated so elbows are pointed slightly upward at top and out to sides at bottom. Return to starting position until chest muscles are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Bench Press.title: Lever Bench Press
Lever Bench Press.description: Lie supine on bench with chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upp er chest. Repeat.

Lever Chest Press.title: Lever Chest Press
Lever Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of horizontal handles. If available, push foot lever until lever is within grasping range. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Release foot lever. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Chest Press.title: Lever Alternating Chest Press
Lever Alternating Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Press one lever until arm is extended. Return lever back until chest muscle is slightly stretched. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

Lever Parallel Grip Chest Press.title: Lever Parallel Grip Chest Press
Lever Parallel Grip Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with sides of ribs approximately height of parallel handles. If available, push foot lever until handles are within grasping range. Grasp parallel handles. Release foot lever. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until shoulders or chest feels slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Decline Chest Press.title: Lever Decline Chest Press
Lever Decline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Decline Chest Press.title: Lever Alternating Decline Chest Press
Lever Alternating Decline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip; elbows out to sides just below shoulders. Press one lever until arm is extended. Return lever back until chest muscle is slightly stretched. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

Lever Decline Bench Press.title: Lever Decline Bench Press
Lever Decline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace and chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to chest. Repeat.

Sled Standing Chest Dip.title: Sled Standing Chest Dip
Sled Standing Chest Dip.description: Stand between handles facing machine. Bend forward slightly and grasp parallel handles with oblique grip. Position elbows upward and outward. Bend knees just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack. Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

Sled Horizontal Grip Standing Chest Dip.title: Sled Horizontal Grip Standing Chest Dip
Sled Horizontal Grip Standing Chest Dip.description: Stand between handles facing machine. Bend forward slightly and grasp transverse handles with overhand grip. Position elbows upward and outward. Bend knees just enough to raise selected weight up from remaining weight stack. Push lever down by straightening arms. Return lever up with elbows flaring out until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.

Smith Bench Press.title: Smith Bench Press
Smith Bench Press.description: Lie supine on bench with chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Smith Decline Bench Press.title: Smith Decline Bench Press
Smith Decline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on decline bench with feet under leg brace and chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Weighted Chest Dip.title: Weighted Chest Dip
Weighted Chest Dip.description: Place weight on dip belt around waist or place dumbbell between lower legs just above feet. Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips and knees bent. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Weighted Push-up.title: Weighted Push-up
Weighted Push-up.description: Lie prone on floor with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Raise body up off floor by extending arms with body straight. Partner can place weight plate(s) on back if needed. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Weighted Push-up (on handles).title: Weighted Push-up (on handles)
Weighted Push-up (on handles).description: Kneel before two push-up handles placed slightly wider than shoulder width apart. Grasp both handles and place feet back on floor or slightly elevated platform. Position body straight with arms extended. Partner can place weight plate(s) on back if needed. Keeping body ridged, lower body downward by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Push body back up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Chest Dip.title: Band-assisted Chest Dip
Band-assisted Chest Dip.description: Place one foot on middle of exercise band with ends looped on wide dip bars. Push band down partially by extending leg. Mount dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight, and shoulders above hands. Place other foot on exercise band next to other foot. Bend knees and hips slightly. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Chest Dip.title: Chest Dip
Chest Dip.description: Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Bend knees and hips slightly. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Chest Dip (between benches).title: Chest Dip (between benches)
Chest Dip (between benches).description: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off ends of benches. Grip should be somewhat wide. Position feet out in front with legs straight, heels on floor, and torso upright. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Chest Dip (bent knees between benches).title: Chest Dip (bent knees between benches)
Chest Dip (bent knees between benches).description: Stand between ends of two benches. Place hands on ends of benches with fingers off ends of benches. Position feet out in front with legs bent and torso upright. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.

Push-up.title: Push-up
Push-up.description: Lie prone on floor with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Raise body up off floor by extending arms with body straight. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Incline Push-up.title: Incline Push-up
Incline Push-up.description: Stand facing bench or sturdy elevated platform. Place hands on edge of bench or platform, slightly wider than shoulder width. Position forefoot back from bench or platform with arms and body straight. Arms should be perpendicular to body. Keeping body straight, lower chest to edge of box or platform by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Incline Push-up (on bar).title: Incline Push-up (on bar)
Incline Push-up (on bar).description: Grasp horizontal bar (lower than chest height) with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Position forefeet back from bar with arms and body straight. Arms should be perpendicular to body. Keeping body straight, lower chest to bar by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Push-up (on knees).title: Push-up (on knees)
Push-up (on knees).description: Lie prone on floor with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Bend knees and raise body up off floor by extending arms with body straight. Keeping body straight and knees bent, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Self-assisted Chest Dip.title: Self-assisted Chest Dip
Self-assisted Chest Dip.description: Stand on bench or elevation between parallel bars. Mount wide dip bar with oblique grip (bar diagonal under palm), arms straight with shoulders above hands. Bend knees and hips slightly and place forefoot on bench or elevation below. Lower body by bending arms, allowing elbows to flare out to sides. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping forefeet in contact with bench or elevation. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up until arms are straight and repeat, again with minimal assistance from legs.

Suspended Chest Dip.title: Suspended Chest Dip
Suspended Chest Dip.description: Stand between two suspension handles and grasp handles on each side of torso. Hold position firmly and lift feet from floor. Push body up until arms are straight. Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

Suspended Self-assisted Chest Dip.title: Suspended Self-assisted Chest Dip
Suspended Self-assisted Chest Dip.description: Stand between two suspension handles, approximately mid-thigh height. Grasp handles on each side and straighten arms with shoulders above hands. Hold position firmly and place portion of body weight on handles. Lower body by bending arms back. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees to bend, keeping feet in contact with floor. When slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, push body up back up until arms are straight. Repeat with minimal assistance from legs.

Suspended Chest Press.title: Suspended Chest Press
Suspended Chest Press.description: Grasp handles and step forward between suspension trainers. Position arms downward and slightly forward, nearly parallel with suspension straps. Lean forward, placing upper body weight onto handles with arms straight, while stepping back onto forefeet so body is leaning forward at desired angle. Straighten body so torso is in-line with legs. Lower body by bending arms while keeping body straight. Allow handles to come apart slightly to keep in-line with elbows flaring out. Stop descent once mild stretch is felt through shoulders or chest. Push body up to original position, allowing handles to travel inward to keep in line with elbows converging until arms are fully extended. Repeat.

Suspended Fly.title: Suspended Fly
Suspended Fly.description: Grasp handles and step forward between suspension trainer. Position arms downward and slightly forward, nearly parallel with suspension straps. Lean forward, placing upper body weight onto handles with arms straight, while stepping back onto forefeet, so body is leaning forward at desired angle. Straighten body so torso is in-line with legs. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders, so elbows are pointed outward to each side. Lower body by allowing suspension handles to separate outward until mild stretch is felt in chest. Reverse motion by bringing handles back together in hugging motion. Repeat.

Barbell Incline Bench Press.title: Barbell Incline Bench Press
Barbell Incline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on incline bench. Dismount barbell from rack over upper chest using wide oblique overhand grip. Lower weight to upper chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Cable Incline Bench Press.title: Cable Incline Bench Press
Cable Incline Bench Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side (attached to low cable pulleys). Lie back on incline back support. Position stirrups out to each side of chest with bent arm under each wrist. Push stirrups up over each shoulder until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Bar Incline Bench Press.title: Cable Bar Incline Bench Press
Cable Bar Incline Bench Press.description: Position adjustable pulley higher than intended height, but within arms reach from incline bench. Position incline bench under cable bar. Lie supine on incline bench. While lying on bench, reach over and lower each pulley into intended position so that cables are taut in lowest position with bar on chest. Grasp bar with both hands using wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar upward until arms are extended. Lower bar to upper chest or until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Incline Chest Press.title: Cable Incline Chest Press
Cable Incline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side (attached to medium height pulleys). Position elbows out to sides, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hands back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Push stirrups away from body, slightly upward at 30º to 45º until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Standing Incline Chest Press.title: Cable Standing Incline Chest Press
Cable Standing Incline Chest Press.description: Stand between two hip height pulleys, facing away from cable columns. Grasp cable stirrups from each side. Position elbows out to sides, lower chest height. Position hands back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Lean and step forward with one foot in front bending forward knee. Push stirrups forward and upward at 30º to 45º angle until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Return stirrups to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable Bar Standing Incline Chest Press.title: Cable Bar Standing Incline Chest Press
Cable Bar Standing Incline Chest Press.description: Stand facing behind cable bar, mounted on each side to lower chest height narrow double pulley cables. Grasp cable bar with wide overhand grip. Position bar upper mid-chest height with elbows angled behind and downward. Lean and step forward with one foot in front, bending forward knee. Push cable bar forward and upward at 30º to 45º until arms are straight. Return cable bar to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulders. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Standing Incline Chest Pre.title: Cable One Arm Standing Incline Chest Press
Cable One Arm Standing Incline Chest Pre.description: Grasp cable stirrup from hip height pulley. Turn body away from pulley. Position elbow of loaded arm out to side, lower chest height. Position loaded hand back approximately shoulder height and elbow width. Step far forward with foot of opposite side of loaded arm. Bend knees and position heel of rear foot off floor. Push stirrups forward and upward at 30º to 45º until arm is straight and in-line with cable. Return stirrup to original position until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Incline Fly.title: Cable Incline Fly
Cable Incline Fly.description: Sit on seat with stirrups in each hand (attached to low cable pulleys). Lie back on incline back support. Position stirrups out to each side of chest with bent arm under each wrist. Press stirrups over each shoulder until arms vertical. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides. Lower stirrups outward to sides of shoulders. Keep elbows fixed in slightly bent position. When a stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, bring stirrups back together in hugging motion above upper chest until stirrups are nearly together Repeat.

Cable Standing Incline Fly.title: Cable Standing Incline Fly
Cable Standing Incline Fly.description: Stand between two pulleys position hip height and arms width or slightly wider apart. Grasp stirrups, one in each hand. Extend arms out with elbows slightly bent, pointed back and downward slightly. Step forward until cables are taut or when weights are lifted up slightly. Stand with feet staggered. Keeping elbows fixed in slightly bent position, bring stirrups together in upwardly arching, hugging motion, at 30º to 45º angle until they meet at top of motion. Lower stirrups to original position in reverse pattern. As soon as stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, repeat motion.

Dumbbell Incline Bench Press.title: Dumbbell Incline Bench Press
Dumbbell Incline Bench Press.description: Sit down on incline bench with dumbbells resting on lower thigh. Kick weights to shoulders and lean back. Position dumbbells to sides of chest with upper arm under each dumbbell. Press dumbbells up with elbows to sides until arms are extended. Lower weight to sides of upper chest until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

Dumbbell Incline Fly.title: Dumbbell Incline Fly
Dumbbell Incline Fly.description: Grasp two dumbbells. Lie supine on bench. Support dumbbells above upper chest with arms fixed in slightly bent position. Bend elbows slightly and internally rotate shoulders so elbows point out to sides. Lower dumbbells outward to sides of shoulders. Keep elbows fixed in slightly bent position. When a stretch is felt in chest or shoulders, bring dumbbells back together in hugging motion above upper chest until dumbbells are nearly together. Repeat.

Lever Incline Bench Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Incline Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Incline Bench Press (plate loaded).description: Lie supine on incline bench with lever bars out to sides of chest. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip. Press lever bars up until arms are extended. Lower weight toward upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Barbell Incline Bench Press (plate.title: Lever Barbell Incline Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Incline Bench Press (plate.description: Lie supine on incline bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press.title: Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press (plate loaded)
Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on incline bench with parallel lever bars out to sides of rib cage. Grasp parallel handles. Press lever bars up until arms are extended. Lower weight toward upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Incline Chest Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Incline Chest Press (plate loaded)
Lever Incline Chest Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat with upper chest just above grips on lever. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip and position elbows out to sides. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Incline Chest Press (on Hammer mil.title: Lever Incline Chest Press (on Hammer military press)
Lever Incline Chest Press (on Hammer mil.description: Sit on seat with upper chest just above base of handles on lever. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip. Lift levers into starting position with elbows slightly low. Press levers until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched with elbows positioned\xa0out to sides. Repeat.

Lever Incline Bench Press.title: Lever Incline Bench Press
Lever Incline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on incline bench with upper chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press.title: Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press
Lever Parallel Grip Incline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on incline bench with parallel lever bars out to sides of rib cage. Grasp parallel handles. Press lever bars up until arms are extended. Lower weight toward upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Incline Chest Press.title: Lever Incline Chest Press
Lever Incline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with upper chest just above grips on lever. If available, push foot lever until handles are within grasping range. Grasp handles with wide oblique overhand grip and position elbows out to sides. Release foot lever. Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until shoulders or chest feels slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Incline Chest Press.title: Lever Alternating Incline Chest Press
Lever Alternating Incline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with upper chest just above grips on lever. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip and position elbows out to sides. Press one lever until arm is extended. Return lever back down until chest muscle is slightly stretched. Repeat with opposite arm, alternating between sides.

Lever Parallel Grip Incline Chest Press.title: Lever Parallel Grip Incline Chest Press
Lever Parallel Grip Incline Chest Press.description: Sit on seat with lower chest at height of parallel handles. If available, push foot lever until handles are within grasping range. Grasp parallel handles. Press lever bars up until arms are extended. Return weight until shoulders or chest feels slightly stretched. Repeat.

Lever Incline Fly.title: Lever Incline Fly
Lever Incline Fly.description: Lie supine on bench. Position inside of forearms under roller pads with arms out to each side. Slightly bend elbows and internally rotate shoulders so elbows are back. Raise lever upward and together in hugging motion. Lower weight until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder. Repeat.

Smith Incline Bench Press.title: Smith Incline Bench Press
Smith Incline Bench Press.description: Lie supine on incline bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower weight to upper chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.

Decline Push-up.title: Decline Push-up
Decline Push-up.description: Kneel on floor with bench or elevation behind body. Position hands on floor slightly wider than shoulder width. Place feet on bench or elevation. Raise body body in plank position with body straight and arms extended. Keeping body straight, lower upper body to floor by bending arms. To allow for full descent, pull head back slightly without arching back. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Decline Push-up (on stability ball).title: Decline Push-up (on stability ball)
Decline Push-up (on stability ball).description: Kneel with chest or waist on exercise ball. Dive over top and place hands on floor with arms extended down supporting upper body.
