While keeping body horizontal, walk hands further away from ball until thighs are positioned on top of ball and hands are slightly wider than shoulder width. Bend knees so feet are up above knees. Keeping hips straight, lower upper body to floor by bending arms. To allow for full descent, pull head back slightly without arching back. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.

Pike Push-up.title: Pike Push-up
Pike Push-up.description: Kneel on two benches positioned side by side slightly apart at end nearest head. Place hands on ends of benches. With forefeet on opposite ends of bench, raise rear end high up with arms, back, and knees straight. Lower head between ends of benches by bending arms. Push body back up to original position by extending arms. Repeat.

Barbell Incline Shoulder Raise.title: Barbell Incline Shoulder Raise
Barbell Incline Shoulder Raise.description: Lie supine on incline bench. Dismount barbell from rack with shoulder width overhand grip. Position barbell over upper chest with elbows extended. Raise shoulders toward bar as high as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.

Cable Incline Shoulder Raise.title: Cable Incline Shoulder Raise
Cable Incline Shoulder Raise.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrups to each side. Push stirrups out at 30º to 45º until arms are straight and parallel to one another. Raise shoulders toward stirrups as high as possible. Lower shoulders down and back and repeat.

Cable One Arm Incline Push.title: Cable One Arm Incline Push
Cable One Arm Incline Push.description: Sit on seat and grasp stirrup with one hand. Position elbow out to side, slightly lower than shoulder height. Position hand down, slightly higher than shoulder height, slightly narrower than elbow width. Push stirrup forward and up at 30º to 45º while rotating torso away allowing shoulder to be extended forward. Return stirrups to original position, until slight stretch, and repeat. Continue with opposite side.

Dumbbell Incline Shoulder Raise.title: Dumbbell Incline Shoulder Raise
Dumbbell Incline Shoulder Raise.description: Sit down on incline bench with dumbbells resting on lower thigh. Kick weights to shoulders and lean back. Position dumbbells above shoulders with elbows extended. Raise shoulders toward dumbbells as high as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.

Lever Incline Shoulder Raise (plate load.title: Lever Incline Shoulder Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Incline Shoulder Raise (plate load.description: Sit on lever chest press machine with shoulders aligned with lever grips. Grasp lever grips with shoulder width overhand grip. Push weight up so arms are straight. Raise shoulders toward lever grips as far as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.

Lever Incline Shoulder Raise.title: Lever Incline Shoulder Raise
Lever Incline Shoulder Raise.description: Sit on lever chest press machine with shoulders aligned with lever grips. Grasp lever grips with shoulder width overhand grip. Push weight up so arms are straight. Raise shoulders toward lever grips as far as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.

Smith Incline Shoulder Raise.title: Smith Incline Shoulder Raise
Smith Incline Shoulder Raise.description: Lie supine on incline bench with shoulders under bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Extend elbows. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Raise shoulders toward bar as high as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.

Push-up Plus.title: Push-up Plus
Push-up Plus.description: Lie prone on floor with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Raise body up off floor by extending arms with body straight. Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Continue lifting body further up by pushing shoulders infront of chest. Repeat.

Safety Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise.title: Safety Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise
Safety Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise.description: Stand facing safety barbell on rack upper chest height and calf block on floor just below. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Place hands on bar to each sides or on vertical rack bars. Position head in yoke with padded bar around shoulders. Dismount bar from rack by standing erect with safety bar, away yet close to rack. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise.title: Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise
Barbell Standing Leg Calf Raise.description: Set barbell on power rack upper chest height with calf block under barbell. Position back of shoulders under barbell with both hands to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Lean barbell against rack and raise from supports by extending knees and hips. Support barbell against verticals with both hands to sides. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Cable Standing Calf Raise.title: Cable Standing Calf Raise
Cable Standing Calf Raise.description: Place cable belt or dip belt around waist. Kneel before low pulley and attach belt to cable. Stand on calf block and grasp support bar for balance. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Cable Single Leg Calf Raise.title: Cable Single Leg Calf Raise
Cable Single Leg Calf Raise.description: Kneel before low pulley and attach cable belt or dip belt to cable. Stand on edge of platform and grasp support bar for balance. Position toes and balls of feet on platform with arches and heels extending off. Lift one leg up off of floor. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat.

Cable One Arm Single Leg Calf Raise.title: Cable One Arm Single Leg Calf Raise
Cable One Arm Single Leg Calf Raise.description: Stand facing low pulley with platform on floor. Bend over and grasp stirrup attachment with one hand. Stand on edge of platform and grasp support bar for balance. Position toes and balls of feet on platform with arches and heels extending off. Lift one leg up off of floor. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat.

Dumbbell Standing Calf Raise.title: Dumbbell Standing Calf Raise
Dumbbell Standing Calf Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell in one hand to side. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Place hand on support for balance. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Dumbbell Single Leg Calf Raise.title: Dumbbell Single Leg Calf Raise
Dumbbell Single Leg Calf Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell in one hand to side. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Place hand on support for balance. Lift other leg to rear by bending knee. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever 45° Calf Press (plate loaded).title: Lever 45° Calf Press (plate loaded)
Lever 45° Calf Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Sit on machine with low back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Place feet high on platform and straighten knees. Position toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with arches and heels extending off. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Calf Extension (plate loaded).title: Lever Calf Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Calf Extension (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat and position forefeet on lever platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push lever by extending ankle as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Donkey Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Donkey Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Donkey Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Position lower back and hips under padded lever. Place forearms on supports. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Seated Calf Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Seated Calf Press (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Calf Press (plate loaded).description: Place seat away from platform. Sit on seat with lower back against back of seat. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform(s) with heels and arches extending off. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push lever platform(s) by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Standing Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Standing Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Standing Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Place shoulders under padded lever. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Calf Raise (on v-squat machine, pl.title: Lever Calf Raise (on v-squat machine, plate loaded)
Lever Calf Raise (on v-squat machine, pl.description: Position shoulders under shoulder pads with back against back pad. Place feet on platform shoulder width apart. Extend hips and knees. Position toes and balls of feet on nearest edge of platform with arches and heels extending off. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever 45° Calf Raise.title: Lever 45° Calf Raise
Lever 45° Calf Raise.description: Sit on machine with low back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform or foot bar with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Calf Extension.title: Lever Calf Extension
Lever Calf Extension.description: Sit on seat and position forefeet on horizontal foot bar. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push lever by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Calf Extension (bilateral).title: Lever Calf Extension (bilateral)
Lever Calf Extension (bilateral).description: Sit on seat and position forefeet on lever platform or foot pedals. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push lever by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Calf Extension.title: Lever Alternating Calf Extension
Lever Alternating Calf Extension.description: Sit on seat and position forefeet on pedals. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push left pedal by extending ankle as far as possible while allowing right pedal to return back until calf is stretched. Reverse motion by pushing right pedal and allowing left pedal to return back. Continue to alternate motion.

Lever Donkey Calf Raise.title: Lever Donkey Calf Raise
Lever Donkey Calf Raise.description: Position lower back and hips under padded lever. Place forearms on supports. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Seated Calf Press.title: Lever Seated Calf Press
Lever Seated Calf Press.description: Place seat away from platform. Sit on seat with lower back against back of seat. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Push lever by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Standing Calf Raise.title: Lever Standing Calf Raise
Lever Standing Calf Raise.description: Place shoulders under padded lever. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Standing Calf Raise (belt loaded).title: Lever Standing Calf Raise (belt loaded)
Lever Standing Calf Raise (belt loaded).description: Place lever belt or dip belt around waist. Kneel before lever and attach belt. Stand on calf block and grasp support bar for balance. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Forward Angled Calf Raise.title: Lever Forward Angled Calf Raise
Lever Forward Angled Calf Raise.description: Place shoulders under padded lever. Position toes and balls of feet on top of calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled 45° Calf Press.title: Sled 45° Calf Press
Sled 45° Calf Press.description: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled 45° Alternating Calf Press.title: Sled 45° Alternating Calf Press
Sled 45° Alternating Calf Press.description: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Grasp handles to sides. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled 45° Calf Raise.title: Sled 45° Calf Raise
Sled 45° Calf Raise.description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on foot platform with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Sled 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Sled 45° Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding and grasp handles to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on foot of platform with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Donkey Calf Raise.title: Sled Donkey Calf Raise
Sled Donkey Calf Raise.description: Position lower back and hips under upper pad. Place forearms on supports. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Straighten knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Hack Calf Press.title: Sled Hack Calf Press
Sled Hack Calf Press.description: Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled up away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Lying Calf Press.title: Sled Lying Calf Press
Sled Lying Calf Press.description: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Lying Calf Press (plate loaded).title: Sled Lying Calf Press (plate loaded)
Sled Lying Calf Press (plate loaded).description: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled away from platform by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Seated Calf Press.title: Sled Seated Calf Press
Sled Seated Calf Press.description: Place seat away from platform. Sit on seat and place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on lower portion of platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Standing Calf Raise.title: Sled Standing Calf Raise
Sled Standing Calf Raise.description: Place shoulders under padded bars. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise.title: Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise
Sled Forward Angled Calf Raise.description: Lie forward so chest is on pad and shoulders are under padded bars. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Grasp handles or sides of padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Release lever if available. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Sled Vertical Calf Press.title: Sled Vertical Calf Press
Sled Vertical Calf Press.description: Lie on back pad. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend hips and knees. Place toes and balls of feet on platform with heels and arches extending off. Push sled by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Smith Donkey Calf Raise.title: Smith Donkey Calf Raise
Smith Donkey Calf Raise.description: Engage both safety stops mid height so bar will be just above in lowest range of motion. Place calf block under bar. Position padded surface of tall bench or Roman Chair in front of smith machine for arm rest. Place stiffly padded board within arms reach. Step on calf block while standing between smith bar and arm rest. Situate padded board on back of hips while bending under smith bar. Arrange smith bar above upper hips or lower waist with padded board in between. Place forearms on supports. Lift bar off of safety stops by straighten knees. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Smith Standing Leg Calf Raise.title: Smith Standing Leg Calf Raise
Smith Standing Leg Calf Raise.description: Position bar on upper chest height and place calf block under bar. Position back of shoulders under bar and grasp bar to sides. Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Stand erect by extending knees and hips. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Weighted Donkey Calf Raise.title: Weighted Donkey Calf Raise
Weighted Donkey Calf Raise.description: Stand on edge of platform, toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Bend over and grasp knee high bar (as shown) or place forearms on thigh high surface (see example). Allow training partner to mount hips or lower back from bench. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Weighted Single Leg Calf Raise.title: Weighted Single Leg Calf Raise
Weighted Single Leg Calf Raise.description: Hang weight from dip belt around waist. Position toes and ball of foot on calf block end of platform with heel and arch extending off. Place hand or hands on support for balance. Lift other leg to rear by bending knee. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Standing Calf Raise.title: Standing Calf Raise
Standing Calf Raise.description: Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with arches and heels extending off. Place hand on support for balance. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Single Leg Calf Raise.title: Single Leg Calf Raise
Single Leg Calf Raise.description: Position toes and balls of feet on calf block or elevation with heels and arches extending off. Place hand or hands on support for balance. Lift one leg to rear by bending knee. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Single Leg Forward Angled Calf Raise.title: Single Leg Forward Angled Calf Raise
Single Leg Forward Angled Calf Raise.description: Stand facing mid-thigh to hip high vertical bar. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Step back so body is angled forward with body straight and arms extended approximately perpendicular to body. Feet should be pointed forward. Lift one leg to rear by bending knee. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible. Allow body to travel forward and upward in same direction as body is orientated. Lower heel allowing foot to come back down flat on floor. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Self-assisted Leg Calf Raise.title: Self-assisted Leg Calf Raise
Self-assisted Leg Calf Raise.description: Position toes and balls of feet on calf block with heels and arches extending off. Place hands on support for assistance. Lift one leg to rear by bending knee. Raise heel by extending ankle as high as possible, assisting with upper body as little as possible. Lower heel by bending ankle until calf is stretched. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Self-assisted Single Leg Calf Raise (wit.title: Self-assisted Single Leg Calf Raise (with opposite leg)
Self-assisted Single Leg Calf Raise (wit.description: Position toes and ball of foot on calf block with heels and arches extending off. Place hand or hands on support for balance. Raise one ankle by bending knee forward, keeping forefoot on platform. Raise body upward as high as possible by extending lower ankle while straightening knee of assisting leg. Lower heel by bending ankle while bending knee of assisting leg forward. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg positioning.

Safety Bar Seated Calf Raise.title: Safety Bar Seated Calf Raise
Safety Bar Seated Calf Raise.description: Place safety bar on rack approximately lower leg height with calf block slightly rear of safety bar. Sit on bench facing safety bar and place toes on lower portion of platform with heels extending off. Scoot forward to edge of bench and position lower thighs under safety bar. Grasp bar to sides and lift bar from rack by pushing heels up. Slide back to center of bench. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Repeat.

Lever Seated Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Seated Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat facing lever. Place forefeet on platform with heels extending off. Position lower thighs under lever pads. Grasp handles if available or place hands on lever pad. Lift lever slightly by pushing heels up. Release support lever. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Repeat.

Lever Bent Knee Calf Extension.title: Lever Bent Knee Calf Extension
Lever Bent Knee Calf Extension.description: With seat close to lever platform or foot pedals, sit on seat. Position forefeet on lever platform or foot pedals. Grasp handles to sides. Push feet into lever platform or foot pedals to prevent knees from coming back during lift. Push lever by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Bent-knee Seated Calf.title: Lever Alternating Bent-knee Seated Calf Extension
Lever Alternating Bent-knee Seated Calf.description: Sit on seat and position forefeet on pedals. Grasp handles to sides and extend knees but maintain small bend in knees. Push left pedal by extending ankle knee Simultaneously allow right pedal to return back by relaxing ankle and bending knee more. Reverse motion by pushing right pedal and allowing left pedal to return back by same means. Continue to alternate motion.

Lever Seated Calf Raise.title: Lever Seated Calf Raise
Lever Seated Calf Raise.description: Sit on seat facing lever. Reach forward and pull hand lever toward body. Place forefeet on platform with heels extending off. Position lower thighs under lever pads. Release hand lever by pushing away from body. Place hands on top of thigh pads. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Lever Seated Calf Extension.title: Lever Seated Calf Extension
Lever Seated Calf Extension.description: With leg pads in upper position, sit on seat and place feet on lever platform with legs under pads. Lower leg pads on legs so they are snuggly adjusted just behind knees.\xa0Place hands on top of thigh pads. Push lever platform down by extending ankles as far as possible. Return by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Repeat.

Smith Seated Calf Raise.title: Smith Seated Calf Raise
Smith Seated Calf Raise.description: Position bar slightly higher than lower leg height. Wrap bar pad around center of bar. Place calf block under bar and bench near bar. Sit on bench facing bar and place toes on lower portion of platform with heels extending off. Grasp bar to sides and extend ankles to raise knees so lower thighs are under padded bar. Push heels further up. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower heels by bending ankles until calves are stretched. Raise heels by extending ankles as high as possible. Repeat.

Barbell Reverse Calf Raise.title: Barbell Reverse Calf Raise
Barbell Reverse Calf Raise.description: Place barbell on power rack upper chest height and calf block under barbell. Position back of shoulders under barbell with both hands to sides. Position heels on forward edge of calf block. Lean barbell against rack and raise from supports by extending knees and hips. Support barbell against verticals with both hands to sides. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Safety Bar Reverse Calf Raise.title: Safety Bar Reverse Calf Raise
Safety Bar Reverse Calf Raise.description: Standing facing safety barbell on rack upper chest height and calf block on floor just below. Position heels on forward edge of calf block. Place hands on bar to each sides or on vertical rack bars. Position head in yoke with padded bar around shoulders. Dismount bar from rack by standing erect with safety bar, away yet close to rack. Pull forefeet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Cable Reverse Calf Raise.title: Cable Reverse Calf Raise
Cable Reverse Calf Raise.description: Place cable belt or dip belt around waist. Kneel before low pulley and attach it to cable. Stand and position heels on forward edge of platform. Grasp support bar for balance. Pull forefeet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Cable Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.title: Cable Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise
Cable Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.description: Place cable belt or dip belt around waist. Kneel before low pulley and attach it to cable. Stand and position heel on forward edge of platform. Raise other leg off block. Grasp support bar for balance. Pull forefoot up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Dumbbell Reverse Calf Raise.title: Dumbbell Reverse Calf Raise
Dumbbell Reverse Calf Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell in one hand to side. Position heels on forward edge of platform. Grasp support with other hand for balance. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Dumbbell Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.title: Dumbbell Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise
Dumbbell Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.description: Grasp dumbbell in one hand to side. Position one heel on forward edge of platform. Grasp support with other hand for balance. Lift other leg to rear by bending knee. Pull forefoot up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending foot until toes are pointed downward. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever 45° Reverse Calf Press (plate load.title: Lever 45° Reverse Calf Press (plate loaded)
Lever 45° Reverse Calf Press (plate load.description: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Place feet very high on platform, grasp handles to sides, and extend knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Lever 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate load.title: Lever 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate load.description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding. Grasp handles to sides and place feet on top portion of platform. Straighten knees and position heels on top edge of platform. Pull forefoot of both feet up and back toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet return to platform. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Place shoulders under padded lever. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Position heels on forward edge of platform placed under padded lever. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Calf Raise (on v-squat mac.title: Lever Reverse Calf Raise (on v-squat machine, plate loaded)
Lever Reverse Calf Raise (on v-squat mac.description: Position shoulders under shoulder pads with back against back pad. Position feet far forward on platform. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Pull forefeet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Calf Extension (plate load.title: Lever Reverse Calf Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Reverse Calf Extension (plate load.description: Sit on seat and position heels on lever platform with fore feet extended off top. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Lever Seated Tibia Raise (plate loaded).title: Lever Seated Tibia Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Tibia Raise (plate loaded).description: Sit on bench or stool. Place both feet under padded lever with heels on pedal. Lift forefeet upward as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Single Leg Seated Tibia Raise (pla.title: Lever Single Leg Seated Tibia Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Seated Tibia Raise (pla.description: Sit on bench or stool. Place foot under padded lever with heel on pedal and other foot off to side. Lift forefoot upward as far as possible. Return by extending foot until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Standing Tibia Raise (plate loaded.title: Lever Standing Tibia Raise (plate loaded)
Lever Standing Tibia Raise (plate loaded.description: Standing behind machine hold on to support for balance. Place foot under padded lever with heel on pedal. Lift forefoot upward as far as possible. Return by extending foot until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Donkey Reverse Calf Raise.title: Lever Donkey Reverse Calf Raise
Lever Donkey Reverse Calf Raise.description: Position lower back and hips under upper lever pad. Place forearms on supports. Position heels on forward edge of platform. Pull forefoot up and toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed away from body. Repeat.

Lever Reverse Calf Extension.title: Lever Reverse Calf Extension
Lever Reverse Calf Extension.description: Sit on seat and position heels on lever platform with fore feet extended off top. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Lever Reverse Calf Raise.title: Lever Reverse Calf Raise
Lever Reverse Calf Raise.description: Place shoulders under padded lever. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Position heels on forward edge of platform placed under padded lever. Grasp handles or sides of padded lever. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Lever Seated Reverse Calf Press.title: Lever Seated Reverse Calf Press
Lever Seated Reverse Calf Press.description: Place seat away from platform. Sit on seat with lower back against padding and place feet very high on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Sled 45° Reverse Calf Press.title: Sled 45° Reverse Calf Press
Sled 45° Reverse Calf Press.description: Sit on seat with back on padded support. Place feet very high on platform, grasp handles to sides, and extend knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise.title: Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise
Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise.description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding. Grasp handles to sides and place feet on platform. Straighten knees and position heels on top edge of platform. Pull forefoot of both feet up and back toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed away from body. Repeat.

Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate loade.title: Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (plate loade.description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding. Grasp handles to sides and place feet on platform. Straighten knees and position heels on top edge of platform. Pull forefoot of both feet up and back toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed away from body. Repeat.

Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (on hack pre.title: Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (on hack press)
Sled 45° Reverse Calf Raise (on hack pre.description: Sit on machine with lower back against padding. Grasp handles to sides and place feet on top portion of platform. Straighten knees and position heels on top edge of platform. Pull forefoot of both feet up and back toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet return to platform. Repeat.

Sled Reverse Donkey Calf Raise (plate lo.title: Sled Reverse Donkey Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Sled Reverse Donkey Calf Raise (plate lo.description: Position lower back and hips under upper pad. Place forearms on supports. Position heels on forward edge of platform. Pull forefoot up and toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed away from body. Repeat.

Sled Hack Reverse Calf Raise.title: Sled Hack Reverse Calf Raise
Sled Hack Reverse Calf Raise.description: Lie supine on back pad with shoulders against pads. Place feet very high on platform. Extend hips and knees. Release dock levers. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed away from body. Repeat.

Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press.title: Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press
Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press.description: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet very high on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press (plate loa.title: Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press (plate loaded)
Sled Lying Reverse Calf Press (plate loa.description: Position sled away from platform. Lie supine on sled with shoulders against pad and place feet very high on platform. Grasp handles to sides and straighten knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Sled Standing Reverse Calf Raise.title: Sled Standing Reverse Calf Raise
Sled Standing Reverse Calf Raise.description: Place shoulders under padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Position heels on forward edge of platform positioned under padded bars. Grasp ends or sides of padded bars. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Sled Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded).title: Sled Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded)
Sled Reverse Calf Raise (plate loaded).description: Place shoulders under padded bars. Stand erect by extending hips and knees. Position heels on forward edge of platform positioned under padded bars. Grasp handles or sides of padded bars. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Sled Seated Reverse Calf Press.title: Sled Seated Reverse Calf Press
Sled Seated Reverse Calf Press.description: Sit on seat and place feet very high on platform. Grasp handles to sides and extend knees. Pull forefoot back toward body as far as possible while pushing platform with heels. Return feet down to platform and repeat.

Smith Reverse Calf Raise.title: Smith Reverse Calf Raise
Smith Reverse Calf Raise.description: Position bar upper chest height and place calf block under bar. Position back of shoulders under bar and grasp bar to sides. Position heels on forward edge of calf block. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Stand erect with knees and hips straight. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Reverse Calf Raise.title: Reverse Calf Raise
Reverse Calf Raise.description: Position heels on forward edge of calf block or platform. Grasp support with other hand for balance. Pull forefoot of both feet up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending feet until toes are pointed downward. Repeat.

Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.title: Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise
Single Leg Reverse Calf Raise.description: Position one heel on forward edge of platform. Grasp support with other hand for balance. Lift other leg to rear by bending knee. Pull forefoot up toward body as far as possible. Return by extending foot until toes are pointed downward. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Barbell Lunge.title: Barbell Lunge
Barbell Lunge.description: Clean bar from floor or dismount bar from rack. From rack with barbell upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Lunge forward with first leg. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by forcibly extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite leg.

Barbell Rear Lunge.title: Barbell Rear Lunge
Barbell Rear Lunge.description: From rack with barbell upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Dismount bar from rack. Step back with one leg while bending supporting leg. Plant forefoot far back on floor. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of supporting leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward supporting leg and return rear leg next to supporting leg. Repeat movement with opposite legs alternating between sides.

Barbell Side Lunge.title: Barbell Side Lunge
Barbell Side Lunge.description: Clean bar from floor or dismount bar from rack. From rack with barbell upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Lunge to one side with first leg. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of lead leg, keeping knee pointed same direction of foot. Return to original standing position by forcibly extending hip and knee of lead leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite leg.

Barbell Walking Lunge.title: Barbell Walking Lunge
Barbell Walking Lunge.description: Position barbell on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Step forward with first leg. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Stand on forward leg with assistance of rear leg. Lunge forward with opposite leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite legs.

Barbell Single Leg Split Squat.title: Barbell Single Leg Split Squat
Barbell Single Leg Split Squat.description: Stand facing away from bench. Position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Extend leg back and place top of foot on bench. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Barbell Side Split Squat.title: Barbell Side Split Squat
Barbell Side Split Squat.description: Place barbell on back of shoulders and grasp bar on each side. Stand with feet wide apart; foot of lead leg angled out to side. Lower body toward side of angled foot by bending knee and hip of lead leg while keeping opposite leg only slightly bent. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of lead leg. Repeat.

Barbell Single Leg Squat.title: Barbell Single Leg Squat
Barbell Single Leg Squat.description:
Stand with arms extended out in front holding barbell. Balance on one leg with opposite leg extended straight leg forward as high as possible. Squat down as far as possible while keeping leg elevated off of floor. Keep
supporting knee pointed same direction as foot supporting. Raise body back up to original position until knee and hip of supporting leg is straight. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Barbell Split Squat.title: Barbell Split Squat
Barbell Split Squat.description: Position barbell on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Stand with feet far apart; one foot forward and other foot behind. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg. Allow heel of rear foot to rise up while knee of rear leg bends slightly until it almost makes contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Barbell Squat.title: Barbell Squat
Barbell Squat.description: From rack with barbell at upper chest height, position bar high on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Dismount bar from rack and stand with shoulder width stance. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Barbell Front Squat.title: Barbell Front Squat
Barbell Front Squat.description: From rack with barbell upper chest height, position bar in front of shoulders. Cross arms and place hands on top of barbell with upper arms parallel to floor. Dismount bar from rack. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Barbell Full Squat.title: Barbell Full Squat
Barbell Full Squat.description: From rack with barbell upper chest height, position barbell on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Dismount bar from rack. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until knees and hips are fully bent. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Barbell Hack Squat.title: Barbell Hack Squat
Barbell Hack Squat.description: Position barbell just behind legs. With feet flat on floor, squat down and grasp barbell from behind with overhand grip. Lift bar by extending hips and knees to full extension. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are close to parallel to floor and bar is behind lower leg. Repeat.

Safety Barbell Squat.title: Safety Barbell Squat
Safety Barbell Squat.description: Stand facing safety barbell on rack upper chest height. Position head in yoke with padded bar around shoulders. Hands can be placed on ends of yoke (as shown) or on safety bar out to sides. Dismount bar from rack and step back. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Stand by extending hips and knees until legs are straight. Repeat.

Safety Barbell Squat (long handles).title: Safety Barbell Squat (long handles)
Safety Barbell Squat (long handles).description: Stand facing safety barbell on rack upper chest height. Position head in yoke with padded bar around shoulders. Grasp ends of handles. Dismount bar from rack and step back. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Stand with or without assistance of arms, extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Repeat.

Safety Barbell Squat (self-spotting).title: Safety Barbell Squat (self-spotting)
Safety Barbell Squat (self-spotting).description: Stand facing safety barbell on rack upper chest height. Place hands vertical rack supports. Position head in yoke with padded bar around shoulders. Dismount bar from rack and step back so body is upright at arm's length from supports. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Stand with or without assistance of arms, extending hips and knees until legs are straight. Repeat.

Trap Bar Squat.title: Trap Bar Squat
Trap Bar Squat.description: Stand on platform under loaded trap bar. Squat down until thighs are just past parallel to floor with knees pointed same direction as feet and feet flat on platform. Grasp handles to sides. Posture chest up with back arched tightly. Lift weight upward by extending knees and hips until straight. Pull shoulders back at top of lift if rounded. Return weights to floor by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward. Repeat.

Barbell Squat (with chains).title: Barbell Squat (with chains)
Barbell Squat (with chains).description: Stand facing barbell, racked upper chest height, with thick chains hanging to floor on each side. Position bar high on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Dismount bar from rack and stand with shoulder width stance. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Barbell Zercher Squat.title: Barbell Zercher Squat
Barbell Zercher Squat.description: From rack with barbell upper waist high, position forearms under bar and in front of bar with elbows shoulder width apart. Cross wrists and pull bar in close against body. Lift barbell from rack. Step back with wide stance, feet pointing out 20-30°. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight, hands close to body, and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are near parallel. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Barbell Step-up.title: Barbell Step-up
Barbell Step-up.description: Stand facing side of bench. Position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Place foot of first leg on bench. Stand on bench by extending hip and knee of first leg and place foot of second leg on bench. Step down with second leg by flexing hip and knee of first leg. Return to original standing position by placing foot of first leg to floor. Repeat first step with opposite leg, alternating first steps between legs.

Barbell Lateral Step-up.title: Barbell Lateral Step-up
Barbell Lateral Step-up.description: Stand between two benches, one to each side. Position bar on back of shoulders and grasp barbell to sides. Lift leg and place foot on bench to side slightly forward of straight knee. Stand on bench by straightening leg and pushing body upward. Step down returning feet to original position. Repeat with opposite leg alternating between legs.

Cable Rear Lunge.title: Cable Rear Lunge
Cable Rear Lunge.description: Stand between two very low pulleys with shoulder width or narrower stance. Squat down and grasp stirrup attachments to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to sides. Step back with one leg while bending supporting leg. Plant forefoot far back on floor. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of supporting leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward supporting leg and return rear leg next to supporting leg. Repeat movement with opposite legs alternating between sides.

Cable Rear Step-down Lunge.title: Cable Rear Step-down Lunge
Cable Rear Step-down Lunge.description: Stand on upper platform with stirrups grasped to sides. Extend one leg back on forefoot. Lower body on other leg by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with lower platform. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat by alternating rear lunge with opposite leg.

Cable Single Leg Split Squat.title: Cable Single Leg Split Squat
Cable Single Leg Split Squat.description: Facing away from bench, stand between two very low pulleys with shoulder width or narrower stance. Squat down and grasp stirrup attachments to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to sides. Extend leg back and place top of foot on bench. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Cable One Arm Single Leg Split Squat.title: Cable One Arm Single Leg Split Squat
Cable One Arm Single Leg Split Squat.description: Stand between bench and low pulley cable. Grasp cable stirrup with one hand. Facing low pulley, extend leg back and place top of foot or forefoot on bench. Place other hand on hip or support to side. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Cable Split Squat (belt).title: Cable Split Squat (belt)
Cable Split Squat (belt).description: Facing low pulley, kneel to attach cable belt or dip belt around waist. Place hand(s) on ballet bar or machine (not on guide rod!) for balance. Stand away from pulley with one leg forward and opposite leg to rear. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg. Allow heel of rear foot to rise up while knee of rear leg bends slightly, until it almost makes contact with floor. Return to original straddle position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with legs in opposite position.

Cable Split Squat.title: Cable Split Squat
Cable Split Squat.description: Stand between two very low cable pulleys. Grasp stirrup attachments with each hand. Place one leg forward and opposite leg back to rear. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg. Allow heel of rear foot to rise up while knee of rear leg bends slightly until it almost makes contact with floor. Return to original straddle position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with legs in opposite position.

Cable One Arm Split Squat.title: Cable One Arm Split Squat
Cable One Arm Split Squat.description: Face low pulley and grasp stirrup attachment with one hand. Stand away from pulley with one leg forward and opposite leg to rear. Place other hand on hip or on support to side. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg. Allow heel of rear foot to rise up while knee of rear leg bends slightly until it almost makes contact with floor. Return to original straddle position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with legs in opposite position.

Cable Squat.title: Cable Squat
Cable Squat.description: Stand with feet shoulder width or slightly wider on platform between very low and close pulley cables. Squat down with knees slightly beyond foot, hips bent back behind, back straight, knees pointed same direction as feet, and shoulder above feet. Grasp stirrups to each side with arms straight. Keeping chest high and back straight, raise stirrups by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Squat down until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Return and repeat.

Cable Bar Squat.title: Cable Bar Squat
Cable Bar Squat.description: Adjust cable pulleys to medium low positions. Kneel under attached cable bar while supporting it with both hands. Position body in lower squat position with cable bar on top of shoulders, both feet flat on floor with mid feet in line with both pulleys, knees positioned same direction as feet, back straight and angled forward, and hands grasping bar to each side. Stand up by extending hips and knees until legs are straight. Squat back down to original squat position by bending hips back and knees forward while keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Return and repeat.

Cable Belt Squat.title: Cable Belt Squat
Cable Belt Squat.description: Place pin on lightest weight. Place belt around waist. Pull cable from pulley and attach to front of belt. Step onto platform and grasp pole. Squat or sit on platform and select desired weight. Stand with feet shoulder width or wider to each side of cable. Place both hands on pole at waist height. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Squat up by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Cable Belt Half Squat.title: Cable Belt Half Squat
Cable Belt Half Squat.description: Place cable belt or dip belt around waist. Kneel before low pulley and attach it to cable. Stand on elevated platform with feet shoulder width or slightly wider on platform between very low and close pulley cables. Place hand(s) on ballet bar or machine (not on guide rod!) for balance. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until weight stack taps or comes very close from making contact. Keeping chest high and back straight, raise back up by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Repeat.

Cable Standing Leg Extension.title: Cable Standing Leg Extension
Cable Standing Leg Extension.description: Stand facing away from low pulley. Place foot in cable boot attachment (as shown) or foot harness. Grasp lateral bars or other prop for support. Stand forward on free leg. Raise knee up positioning thigh approximately 45° forward. Allow lower leg attached to cable to be pulled back. Keeping thigh stationary, extend lower leg forward until leg is straight. Return by lowering lower leg down and back to original position. Repeat.

Cable Step Down.title: Cable Step Down
Cable Step Down.description: Grasp cable stirrup(s) with both hands. Place one foot on elevated platform positioned near or between low pulleys. Raise body by extending knee and hip on platform until leg is straight. Return until foot of lower leg makes contact with lower platform or floor and repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Cable Step-up.title: Cable Step-up
Cable Step-up.description: Stand behind elevated platform and low and close pulley cables to sides. Grasp stirrups at each side of platform. Stand upright with arms straight down at sides. Place foot of first leg on elevated platform. Stand on elevated platform by extending hip and knee of first leg and place foot of second leg on bench. Step down with second leg by flexing hip and knee of first leg. Return to original standing position by placing foot of first leg to lower position. Repeat first step with opposite leg, alternating first steps between legs.

Dumbbell Lunge.title: Dumbbell Lunge
Dumbbell Lunge.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Lunge forward with first leg. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by forcibly extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Alternating Side Lunge.title: Dumbbell Alternating Side Lunge
Dumbbell Alternating Side Lunge.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Lunge to one side with first leg. Position closest dumbbell behind thigh and opposite dumbbell to front. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of lead leg, keeping knee pointed same direction of foot. Return to original standing position by forcibly extending hip and knee of lead leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Rear Lunge.title: Dumbbell Rear Lunge
Dumbbell Rear Lunge.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Step back with one leg while bending supporting leg. Plant forefoot far back on floor. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of supporting leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward supporting leg and return rear leg next to supporting leg. Repeat movement with opposite legs alternating between sides.

Dumbbell Side Lunge.title: Dumbbell Side Lunge
Dumbbell Side Lunge.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Lunge to one side with first leg. Position closest dumbbell behind thigh and opposite dumbbell to front. Land on heel then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of lead leg, keeping knee pointed same direction of foot. Return to original standing position by forcibly extending hip and knee of lead leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Walking Lunge.title: Dumbbell Walking Lunge
Dumbbell Walking Lunge.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Step forward with first leg. Land on heel, then forefoot. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Stand on forward leg with assistance of rear leg. Lunge forward with opposite leg. Repeat by alternating lunge with opposite legs.

Dumbbell Single Leg Split Squat.title: Dumbbell Single Leg Split Squat
Dumbbell Single Leg Split Squat.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides facing away from bench. Extend leg back and place top of foot on bench. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg and repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Single Leg Squat.title: Dumbbell Single Leg Squat
Dumbbell Single Leg Squat.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Balance on one leg with opposite leg extended straight leg forward as high as possible. Squat down as far as possible while keeping leg elevated off of floor. Keep supporting knee pointed same direction as foot supporting. Raise body back up to original position until knee and hip of supporting leg is straight. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Split Squat.title: Dumbbell Split Squat
Dumbbell Split Squat.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Position feet far apart; one foot forward and other foot behind. Squat down by flexing knee and hip of front leg. Allow heel of rear foot to rise up while knee of rear leg bends slightly until it almost makes contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Dumbbell Squat.title: Dumbbell Squat
Dumbbell Squat.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Front Squat.title: Dumbbell Front Squat
Dumbbell Front Squat.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides. Clean dumbbells up to shoulders so side of each dumbbell rests on top of each shoulder. Balance dumbbells on shoulder by holding on to dumbbells with elbows flaring outward.\xa0Position feet shoulder width or slightly narrower apart. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Dumbbell Step-up.title: Dumbbell Step-up
Dumbbell Step-up.description: Stand with dumbbells grasped to sides facing side of bench. Place foot of first leg on bench. Stand on bench by extending hip and knee of first leg and place foot of second leg on bench. Step down with second leg by flexing hip and knee of first leg. Return to original standing position by placing foot of first leg to floor. Repeat first step with opposite leg alternating first steps between legs.

Dumbbell Lateral Step-up.title: Dumbbell Lateral Step-up
Dumbbell Lateral Step-up.description: Stand between two benches, one to each side. Hold dumbbells in each hand down to sides Lift leg and place foot on bench to side slightly forward of straight knee. Stand on bench by straightening leg and pushing body upward. Step down returning feet to original position. Repeat with opposite leg alternating between legs.

Dumbbell Step Down.title: Dumbbell Step Down
Dumbbell Step Down.description: Hold dumbbells in each hand down to sides and stand with one foot on bench. Position foot on bench to side slightly forward of straight knee. Stand on bench by straightening leg and pushing body upward. Step down returning foot off of bench to floor and repeat. Continue with opposite position.

Lever Leg Extension (plate loaded).title: Lever Leg Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Leg Extension (plate loaded).description: Sit on apparatus with back against padded back support. Place front of lower legs under padded lever. Position knee articulation at same axis as lever fulcrum. Grasp handles to sides for support. Move lever forward and upward by extending knees until legs are straight. Return lever to original position by bending knees. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Leg Extension (plate l.title: Lever Alternating Leg Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Alternating Leg Extension (plate l.description: Sit on apparatus with back against padded back support. Place front of lower legs under padded lever. Position knee articulation at same axis as lever fulcrum. Grasp handles to sides for support. Move one lever forward and upward by extending one knee until leg is straight. Lower to original position. Repeat with opposite side. Continue to alternate between sides.

Lever 45° Leg Press (plate loaded).title: Lever 45° Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever 45° Leg Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Extend hips and knees. Release dock lever and grasp handles to sides. Lower platform by flexing hips and knees until hips are completely flexed. Return by extending knees and hips. Repeat.

Lever Single Leg 45° Leg Press.title: Lever Single Leg 45° Leg Press
Lever Single Leg 45° Leg Press.description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place one foot mid height to low on platform. Place outside of resting foot on lower surface with knee positioned out for greater clearance. Push platform up by extending hip and knee. Release dock lever and grasp handles to sides. Lower platform by bending leg until knee is just short of complete flexion. Return by extending knee and hip. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Hack Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Hack Press (plate loaded)
Lever Hack Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat with back of hips against back pad. Place feet on platform shoulder width or slightly wider. Extend hips and knees. Disengage dock lever if it does not automatically disengage. Lower seat by flexing hips and knees until either is near complete flexion. Raise seat by extending knees and hips. Repeat.

Lever Lying Leg Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Lying Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever Lying Leg Press (plate loaded).description: Climb up steps to top of machine. Lie supine on horizontal padded platform with shoulders against pad. Place feet equally spaced on platform. Grip handles above shoulder pads. Push lever platform away by extending hips and knees until knees are straight. Return lever platform by flexing hips and knees until knees are just short of complete flexion or until hips are completely flexed. Repeat.

Lever Lying Leg Press (custom - plate lo.title: Lever Lying Leg Press (custom - plate loaded)
Lever Lying Leg Press (custom - plate lo.description: Lie supine on padded platform. Place hands on bars above head or to sides. Place feet flat on lever platform with hips and knees bent. Push lever platform by extending hips and knees until knees are straight. Flex hips and knees to descend until knees are just short of complete flexion. Repeat.

Lever Single Leg Lying Leg Press (custom.title: Lever Single Leg Lying Leg Press (custom - plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Lying Leg Press (custom.description: Lie supine on padded platform. Place hands on bars above head or to sides. Place one foot on platform and other foot on floor below platform. Push platform away by extending hip and knee. Return by bending leg until knee or hip is just short of complete flexion. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Seated Leg Press (plate loaded).title: Lever Seated Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Leg Press (plate loaded).description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides. Push platform(s) away by extending knees and hips until knees are fully extended. Return until hips are completely flexed. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Seated Leg Press (plat.title: Lever Alternating Seated Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever Alternating Seated Leg Press (plat.description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides. Push one platform away by extending knee and hip. Return to original position. Repeat with opposite leg. Continue by alternating between sides.

Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press (plate.title: Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press (plate.description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place one foot slightly low on platform and other foot near floor below platform or off to side. Push platform away by extending hip and knee. Return by bending leg until knee or hip is just short of complete flexion. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Single Leg Standing Leg Press (pla.title: Lever Single Leg Standing Leg Press (plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Standing Leg Press (pla.description: Step on left platform with left foot. Grasp handle bars to each side. Place right foot on highest lever platform. Push platform down by extending hip and knee until straight. Return leg to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg positions.

Lever Rear Lunge (plate loaded).title: Lever Rear Lunge (plate loaded)
Lever Rear Lunge (plate loaded).description: Stand between lever handles to sides. Squat down with feet flat on floor and grasp lower handles to sides. Lift lever by extending hips and knees to full extension. Step back with one leg while bending supporting leg. Plant forefoot far back on floor. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of supporting leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward supporting leg and return rear leg next to supporting leg. Repeat movement with opposite legs alternating between sides.

Lever Barbell Rear Lunge (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Rear Lunge (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Rear Lunge (plate loaded).description: With bar upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Place feet under bar. Straighten legs so weight is lifted. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Step back with one leg while bending supporting leg. Plant forefoot far back on floor. Lower body by flexing knee and hip of supporting leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward supporting leg and return rear leg next to supporting leg. Repeat movement with opposite legs alternating between sides.

Lever Single Leg Split Squat (plate load.title: Lever Single Leg Split Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Split Squat (plate load.description: Stand between lever handles to sides. Extend leg back and place top of foot on cross bar. Squat down and grasp handles to sides. With chest high, lift lever by extending hips and knees to full extension. Return until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Barbell Single Leg Split Squat (pl.title: Lever Barbell Single Leg Split Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Single Leg Split Squat (pl.description: Place bench behind smith bar. With bar upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Place foot slightly forward under bar. Extend other leg back and place top of foot on bench. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower body on leg by flexing knee and hip of front leg until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original standing position by extending hip and knee of forward leg. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Single Leg Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Single Leg Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Single Leg Squat (plate loaded).description: Stand between handles facing away from fulcrum. Grasp both handles to sides and stand upright. Cross lower leg above knee of supporting leg. Bend knees forward slightly while allowing hips to bend back behind, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Squat down as low as possible. Extend knee and hip until leg is straight. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Split Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Split Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Split Squat (plate loaded).description: Stand between lever handles to sides. Place forefoot of one foot on floor to rear and other foot slightly forward. Squat down and grasp handles to sides. With chest high, lift lever by extending hips and knees to full extension. Return until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Barbell Split Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Split Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Split Squat (plate loaded).description: With bar upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Place one foot slightly forward and forefoot of other leg further back. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Lower body on other leg by flexing knees and hips of both legs until knee of rear leg is almost in contact with floor. Return to original straddled position by extending hips and knees of both legs. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.

Lever Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Squat (plate loaded).description: Squat down to place shoulders under padded lever. Place feet shoulder width apart directly under shoulders. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Release support lever. Lower lever by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Lift lever up by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Repeat.

Lever Barbell Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Squat (plate loaded).description: With bar upper chest height, position bar on back of shoulders and grasp bar to sides. Place feet under bar. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Return and repeat.

Lever Front Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Front Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Front Squat (plate loaded).description: Step onto platform facing padded levers. Squat down to place shoulders under padded lever. Place feet shoulder width apart on platform. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Release support lever if it does not disengage by itself. Lower lever by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until thighs are just past parallel to floor. Lift lever up by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Repeat.

Lever Full Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Full Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Full Squat (plate loaded).description: Squat down to place shoulders under padded lever. Place feet shoulder width apart directly under shoulders. Extend knees and hips until legs are straight. Release support lever. Squat down by bending hips back while allowing knees to bend forward, keeping back straight and knees pointed same direction as feet. Descend until knees and hips are fully bent. Lift lever up by extending knees and hips until legs are straight. Repeat.

Lever Hack Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever Hack Squat (plate loaded)
Lever Hack Squat (plate loaded).description: Lie supine on back pad with shoulders under shoulder pad. Place feet on platform. Extend hips and knees and release lever. Lower lever by flexing hips and knees until knees are just short of complete flexion. Raise sled by extending knees and hips. Repeat.

Lever V-Squat (plate loaded).title: Lever V-Squat (plate loaded)
Lever V-Squat (plate loaded).description: Position shoulders under shoulder pads with back against back pad. Place feet on platform, shoulder width apart. Extend hips and knees and release lever. Lower lever by flexing hips and knees until knees are just short of complete flexion. Raise sled by extending knees and hips. Repeat.

Lever Leg Extension.title: Lever Leg Extension
Lever Leg Extension.description: Sit on apparatus with back against padded back support. Place front of lower legs under padded lever. Position knee articulation at same axis as lever fulcrum. Grasp handles to sides for support. Move lever forward and upward by extending knees until legs are straight. Return lever to original position by bending knees. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Leg Extension.title: Lever Alternating Leg Extension
Lever Alternating Leg Extension.description: Sit on apparatus with back against padded back support. Place front of lower legs under padded lever. Position knee articulation at same axis as lever fulcrum. Grasp handles to sides for support. Move lever forward and upward by extending one knee until leg is straight. Lower to original position. Repeat with opposite leg. Continue to alternate between sides.

Lever Alternating Leg Extension (unilate.title: Lever Alternating Leg Extension (unilateral machine)
Lever Alternating Leg Extension (unilate.description: Sit on apparatus with back against padded back support. Place front of lower legs under padded levers. Position knee articulation at same axis as lever fulcrum. Grasp handles to sides for support. Move one lever forward and upward by extending one knee until leg is straight. Lower to original position. Repeat with opposite side. Continue to alternate between sides.

Lever Alternating Lying Leg Press.title: Lever Alternating Lying Leg Press
Lever Alternating Lying Leg Press.description: Lie on machine with shoulder under pads. Place feet on individual lever platforms. Grasp handles to sides. Push both lever platforms away by extending knees and hips so knees are straight. Lower one lever platform toward body by bending knee and hip until weight taps or nearly taps unused portion of weight stack. Push lever platform away by extending knee and hip. Repeat with opposite leg. Continue by alternating between sides.

Lever Seated Leg Press.title: Lever Seated Leg Press
Lever Seated Leg Press.description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place feet on platform. Grasp handles to sides. Push platform away by extending knees and hips. Return and repeat.

Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press.title: Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press
Lever Single Leg Seated Leg Press.description: Sit on machine with back on padded support. Place one foot slightly low on platform and other foot on floor below platform. Push platform away by extending hip and knee. Return by bending leg until knee or hip is just short of complete flexion. Repeat. Continue with opposite leg.
