Cable Twisting Standing Overhead Pull.description: Stand facing very high pulley. Grasp stirrup in one hand and step back so arm is straight. With leg of opposite side as loaded arm, plant forefoot far back on floor. Slightly bend knee of forward leg, same direction as foot. Pull down cable attachment to side of chest and rotate body toward side of pulling arm. Return until arm and shoulder is fully extended, allowing shoulder to raise. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Underhand Pulldown.title: Cable Underhand Pulldown
Cable Underhand Pulldown.description: Grasp cable bar with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down cable bar to upper chest until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Close Grip Pulldown (plate-loaded).title: Lever Close Grip Pulldown (plate-loaded)
Lever Close Grip Pulldown (plate-loaded).description: Grasp handles and sit with thighs under padded supports. Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Front Pulldown (plate loaded).title: Lever Front Pulldown (plate loaded)
Lever Front Pulldown (plate loaded).description: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down lever bar to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Pulldown (plate loaded).title: Lever Pulldown (plate loaded)
Lever Pulldown (plate loaded).description: Grasp handles to each side with overhand grip. Sit on seat and position thighs under leg pads. Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Pullover (plate loaded).title: Lever Pullover (plate loaded)
Lever Pullover (plate loaded).description: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind. Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.

Lever Rear Pulldown (plate loaded).title: Lever Rear Pulldown (plate loaded)
Lever Rear Pulldown (plate loaded).description: Grasp lever bar with wide grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull lever bar down behind neck. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Underhand Pulldown (plate loaded).title: Lever Underhand Pulldown (plate loaded)
Lever Underhand Pulldown (plate loaded).description: Grasp lever bar with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down lever handles toward sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Close Grip Pulldown.title: Lever Close Grip Pulldown
Lever Close Grip Pulldown.description: Grasp parallel lever bars. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Front Pulldown.title: Lever Front Pulldown
Lever Front Pulldown.description: Grasp lever handles. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down lever to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Iron Cross.title: Lever Iron Cross
Lever Iron Cross.description: Stand on platform and grasp handles to sides with palms down grip. With arms straight, pull lever handles down below hips. Return lever handles upward just above shoulder high, or just before slight pressure in shoulder is felt. Repeat.

Lever Pulldown.title: Lever Pulldown
Lever Pulldown.description: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp handles with overhand grip. Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Pulldown (parallel grip).title: Lever Pulldown (parallel grip)
Lever Pulldown (parallel grip).description: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp parallel handles. Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Pullover.title: Lever Pullover
Lever Pullover.description: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine and push foot lever. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind. Release foot lever and place feet on platform or to sides. Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.

Lever Underhand Pulldown.title: Lever Underhand Pulldown
Lever Underhand Pulldown.description: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down lever handles to upper chest until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Lever Alternating Underhand Pulldown.title: Lever Alternating Underhand Pulldown
Lever Alternating Underhand Pulldown.description: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports. Pull down one lever handle to side until elbow is down to side. Return until arm and shoulder are fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate pulldown between arms.

Weighted Chin-up.title: Weighted Chin-up
Weighted Chin-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Weighted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up.title: Weighted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up
Weighted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp close grip parallel bars. Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Weighted Pull-up.title: Weighted Pull-up
Weighted Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Weighted Pull-up (neutral grip).title: Weighted Pull-up (neutral grip)
Weighted Pull-up (neutral grip).description: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Weighted Pull-up (open-centered bar).title: Weighted Pull-up (open-centered bar)
Weighted Pull-up (open-centered bar).description: Reach up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Weighted Rear Pull-up.title: Weighted Rear Pull-up
Weighted Rear Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Chin-up.title: Band-assisted Chin-up
Band-assisted Chin-up.description: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width\xa0grip while keeping banded leg straight. Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Pull-up.title: Band-assisted Pull-up
Band-assisted Pull-up.description: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip while keeping banded leg straight. Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Neutral Grip Pull-up.title: Band-assisted Neutral Grip Pull-up
Band-assisted Neutral Grip Pull-up.description: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp bar with neutral grip while keeping banded leg straight. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Parallel Grip Pull-up.title: Band-assisted Parallel Grip Pull-up
Band-assisted Parallel Grip Pull-up.description: Grab each side of hanging exercise band with both hands. Stretch exercise band down and step onto bottom inside of band with one foot. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Reach up and grasp parallel bars while keeping banded leg straight. Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Band-assisted Rear Pull-up.title: Band-assisted Rear Pull-up
Band-assisted Rear Pull-up.description: Grasp middle of\xa0hanging exercise band and pull down to side of leg. Lift foot and hook band under heel. Stretch band down further by extending leg straight down. Face perpendicular under pullup bar and position band behind body. Pull band apart and place other foot onto band so both feet are together inside of band. Reach up and grasp pull-up bar with overhand wide grip while keeping\xa0legs straight. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Chin-up.title: Chin-up
Chin-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Parallel Close Grip Pull-up.title: Parallel Close Grip Pull-up
Parallel Close Grip Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp parallel bars. Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Pull-up.title: Pull-up
Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Pull-up (neutral grip).title: Pull-up (neutral grip)
Pull-up (neutral grip).description: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Pull-up (open-centered bar).title: Pull-up (open-centered bar)
Pull-up (open-centered bar).description: Reach up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Rear Pull-up.title: Rear Pull-up
Rear Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Partner-assisted Chin-up.title: Partner-assisted Chin-up
Partner-assisted Chin-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind. Pull body up until elbows are to sides or chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Partner-assisted Pull-up.title: Partner-assisted Pull-up
Partner-assisted Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind. Pull body up until chin is just above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Partner-assisted Rear Pull-up.title: Partner-assisted Rear Pull-up
Partner-assisted Rear Pull-up.description: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Bend knees so partner can assist from behind. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Self-assisted Chin-up.title: Self-assisted Chin-up
Self-assisted Chin-up.description: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with underhand grip shoulder width. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar. Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until elbows are to sides, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

Self-assisted Pull-up.title: Self-assisted Pull-up
Self-assisted Pull-up.description: Stand facing fixed horizontal bar at neck height. Grasp bar with wide overhand grip. Position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of bar. Lower body under bar until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above bar, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

Self-assisted Rear Pull-up.title: Self-assisted Rear Pull-up
Self-assisted Rear Pull-up.description: Grasp bar with overhand wide grip. Position forefeet on floor just behind low bar or on bench just behind high bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent allowing knees to bend. Pull body up until bar touches back of neck, again with minimal assistance from lower body. Repeat.

Suspended Pull-up.title: Suspended Pull-up
Suspended Pull-up.description: Grasp high suspension handles. Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.

Suspended Self-assisted Pull-up.title: Suspended Self-assisted Pull-up
Suspended Self-assisted Pull-up.description: Stand facing suspension handles placed at neck height. Grasp handles and position feet forward on floor, slightly in front of handles. Lower body under handles until arms and shoulders are fully extended. If necessary, use minimal assistance of lower body to control descent, allowing knees and hips to bend, keeping flat on floor. Pull body up until chin is just above handles, again with minimal assistance from legs. Repeat.

Stability Ball Rollout.title: Stability Ball Rollout
Stability Ball Rollout.description: Kneel on floor or mat facing stability ball within arm's reach. Straighten hips with subtle bend. Also straighten arms with slight bend, down in front of body. Place fists side by side on upper side of ball closest to hips. Lean forward and roll ridged arms out over ball. Roll forward as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

Wheel Rollout.title: Wheel Rollout
Wheel Rollout.description: Kneel on floor or mat. Grasp handles on wheel to each side with overhand grip. Position wheel near front of knees and lean over wheel with arms extended downward, supporting upper body. With arms straight, roll wheel out as far as possible. Lower body gently to floor extending arms forward. Raise body back up by flexing hips and pulling arms back to original position. Return until hips are extended. Repeat.

Suspended Rollout.title: Suspended Rollout
Suspended Rollout.description: Kneel on floor or mat and grasp suspension trainer handles. Position body upright with subtle bend through hip. Also, straighten arms in front of body with slight bend. Lean body forward while maintaining small bend in hip. Allow arms to bend forward to sides of head. Bend over as far as possible. Raise body back up by pulling arms back until kneeling upright in original position. Repeat.

Cambered Barbell Seated Shrug.title: Cambered Barbell Seated Shrug
Cambered Barbell Seated Shrug.description: Sit on end of bench and grasp cambered bar from beneath with overhand or mixed grip. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Barbell Shrug.title: Barbell Shrug
Barbell Shrug.description: Stand holding barbell with overhand or mixed grip; shoulder width or slightly wider. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Trap Bar Shrug.title: Trap Bar Shrug
Trap Bar Shrug.description: Step into trap barbell and stand holding handles of trap bar to sides. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Trap Bar Shrug (elevated stand).title: Trap Bar Shrug (elevated stand)
Trap Bar Shrug (elevated stand).description: Step into elevated trap bar stand. Bend down and grasp handles of apparatus to sides. Stand upright. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Shrug.title: Cable Shrug
Cable Shrug.description: Stand facing low pulley and grasp cable bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Stand close to pulley. With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Bar Shrug.title: Cable Bar Shrug
Cable Bar Shrug.description: Position adjustable pulleys at low position. Stand close to cable bar and grasp with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Shrug (dual pulley).title: Cable Shrug (dual pulley)
Cable Shrug (dual pulley).description: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side. With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable Shrug (with stirrups).title: Cable Shrug (with stirrups)
Cable Shrug (with stirrups).description: Stand between two low pulleys and grasp stirrups to each side. Stand upright with arms straight down to each side. With arms straight, elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Cable One Arm Shrug.title: Cable One Arm Shrug
Cable One Arm Shrug.description: Grasp stirrup with one hand and stand close to low pulley to side. With arms straight, elevate shoulder as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Dumbbell Shrug.title: Dumbbell Shrug
Dumbbell Shrug.description: Stand holding dumbbells to sides. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Gripless Shrug (plate loaded).title: Lever Gripless Shrug (plate loaded)
Lever Gripless Shrug (plate loaded).description: Stand with shoulders under padded lever. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Seated Shrug (plate loaded).title: Lever Seated Shrug (plate loaded)
Lever Seated Shrug (plate loaded).description: Sit on bench and grasp lower handles to each side. Sit upright. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Shrug (plate loaded).title: Lever Shrug (plate loaded)
Lever Shrug (plate loaded).description: Stand between lever handles to sides. Squat down with feet flat on floor and grasp upper handles to sides. Stand upright by extending hips and knees to full extension. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Barbell Shrug (plate loaded).title: Lever Barbell Shrug (plate loaded)
Lever Barbell Shrug (plate loaded).description: Stand behind bar mid-thigh height. Stand grasping bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back and stand upright. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Narrow Grip Shrug (plate loaded).title: Lever Narrow Grip Shrug (plate loaded)
Lever Narrow Grip Shrug (plate loaded).description: Stand very near to close lever handles. Bend over and grasp handles with each hand. Stand upright. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Gripless Shrug.title: Lever Gripless Shrug
Lever Gripless Shrug.description: Stand with shoulders under padded lever. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Seated Gripless Shrug.title: Lever Seated Gripless Shrug
Lever Seated Gripless Shrug.description: Sit on seat and place forearms in padded bars. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Lever Shrug.title: Lever Shrug
Lever Shrug.description: Stand holding lever bar with shoulder width overhand or mixed grip. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Sled Gripless Shrug.title: Sled Gripless Shrug
Sled Gripless Shrug.description: Stand with shoulders under padded bar. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Smith Shrug.title: Smith Shrug
Smith Shrug.description: Stand grasping smith bar with shoulder width or slightly wider overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back. Elevate shoulders as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

Hang Clean.title: Hang Clean
Hang Clean.description: Stand with barbell with overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder width. Feet point forward hip's width apart or slightly wider. Bend knees and hips so barbell touches mid-thigh; shoulders over bar with back arched. Arms are straight with elbows pointed along bar. Chest is spread and wrists are slightly flexed. Jump upward extending body. Shrug shoulders and pull barbell upward with arms, allowing elbows to flex out to sides, keeping bar close to body. Aggressively pull body under bar, rotating elbows around bar. Catch bar on shoulders while moving into squat position. Hitting bottom of squat, stand up immediately.ReturnBend knees slightly and lower barbell to mid-thigh position.

Inverted Shrug (on parallel bars).title: Inverted Shrug (on parallel bars)
Inverted Shrug (on parallel bars).description: Stand between parallel bars. Squat down and grasp parallel bars from above. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down. Legs can be kept bent or straight, positioned vertically. Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

Suspended Inverted Shrug.title: Suspended Inverted Shrug
Suspended Inverted Shrug.description: Grasp gymnastics rings, one in each hand. Sit on mat between parallel bars. Kick legs up inverting and balancing body upside down. Raise body up a high as possible by pulling shoulders toward ears. Lower body to original position and repeat.

Cable Seated Shoulder External Rotation.title: Cable Seated Shoulder External Rotation
Cable Seated Shoulder External Rotation.description: Sit with side to low pulley. Grasp dumbbell cable attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly. Pull cable attachment away from body by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

Cable Standing Shoulder External Rotatio.title: Cable Standing Shoulder External Rotation
Cable Standing Shoulder External Rotatio.description: Stand with side to elbow height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment with far arm. Position elbow against side and forearm across belly. Pull cable attachment away from body as far as possible by externally rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Turn around and continue with opposite arm.

Cable Upright Shoulder External Rotation.title: Cable Upright Shoulder External Rotation
Cable Upright Shoulder External Rotation.description: Stand facing low to medium height cable pulley. Grasp stirrup attachment and position bent elbow shoulder height out to side with forearm in line with cable. Pull stirrup up and back as far as possible. Return by lowering stirrup to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Lying Shoulder External Rotatio.title: Dumbbell Lying Shoulder External Rotation
Dumbbell Lying Shoulder External Rotatio.description: Lie on side with legs separated for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly. Lift dumbbell by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip over and continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Incline Shoulder External Rotat.title: Dumbbell Incline Shoulder External Rotation
Dumbbell Incline Shoulder External Rotat.description: Lie high up on low incline bench or reverse on decline bench on side with arm pit over leg pad (as demonstrated). Position legs lower on bench for support. Grasp dumbbell and position elbow against side and forearm across belly. Lift dumbbell upright above elbow by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Flip body over and continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Seated Shoulder External Rotati.title: Dumbbell Seated Shoulder External Rotation
Dumbbell Seated Shoulder External Rotati.description: Sit on bench. Place foot on other side of bench and other foot on floor with knees bent. Place upper elbow on knee with dumbbell positioned above knee. Lower dumbbell downward toward lower leg by rotating shoulder until slight stretch is felt. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotat.title: Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotation
Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotat.description: Stand or sit with dumbbell positioned out to side of head; bend elbow, shoulder height with dumbbell above elbow. Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotat.title: Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotation (with support)
Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotat.description: Stand or sit with side against chest height platform. With dumbbell in hand, position upper arm horizontally on platform, elbow bent so forearm is upright. Lower dumbbell forward by rotating shoulder. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Lever Shoulder External Rotation (plate.title: Lever Shoulder External Rotation (plate loaded)
Lever Shoulder External Rotation (plate.description: Lie supine on section of bench nearest pads to each side. Position body so shoulders and elbows are aligned to fulcrum on each side. Place wrists or back of hands on under upper set of pads to each side. Pull both lever arms back and down as far as possible to each side of head by simultaneously rotating upper arms. Lower lever arms to original position and repeat.

Lever Shoulder External Rotation.title: Lever Shoulder External Rotation
Lever Shoulder External Rotation.description: Place elbow on forearm pad and grasp handle with upper arm to side of body and forearm against body. Pull lever away from body. Return and repeat. Adjust lever to opposite side and repeat with other arm.

Lever Upright Shoulder External Rotation.title: Lever Upright Shoulder External Rotation
Lever Upright Shoulder External Rotation.description: Lever should be forward with lever handle down. Push elbow pad forward with forearm, grasp handle with overhand grip. Sit on seat with arm pads and lever to side and position in elbow pad at shoulder height. With opposite hand, grasp seat handle if available, for added stability. Pull lever handle upward and back as far as possible by rotating upper arm. Lower lever to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Suspended Shoulder External Rotation.title: Suspended Shoulder External Rotation
Suspended Shoulder External Rotation.description: Grasp suspension handles and position bent elbows to each sides of waist.Step back until suspension straps are taut. While keeping bent elbows to side, step forward slightly so body reclines back behind suspension handles. Pull handles apart from each side, while keeping fixed elbow position and body and legs straight throughout movement. Raise forward so handles are to each side of body. Return back until handles come back together in front of body. Repeat.

Cable Seated Shoulder Internal Rotation.title: Cable Seated Shoulder Internal Rotation
Cable Seated Shoulder Internal Rotation.description: Sit with side to low pulley. Grasp cable stirrup with near arm. Position elbow against side with elbow bent approximately 90°. Pull cable stirrup toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is across belly. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Standing Shoulder Internal Rotatio.title: Cable Standing Shoulder Internal Rotation
Cable Standing Shoulder Internal Rotatio.description: Stand with side to elbow height cable pulley. Grasp cable stirrup with near arm. Position elbow against side with elbow bent approximately 90°. Pull cable stirrup toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is across belly. Return and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on.title: Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on bench)
Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on.description: Hold dumbbell in one hand. Lie on bench close to edge on side with dumbbell in hand. Position elbow on edge of bench against side of body with elbow bent approximately 90°. Position legs on bench for support. Maintaining 90° bend in elbow, lower dumbbell away from body until slight stretch is felt in shoulder. Lift dumbbell toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is across belly. Continue with opposite arm.

Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on.title: Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on floor)
Dumbbell Shoulder Internal Rotation (on.description: Hold dumbbell in one hand. Lie on mat with dumbbell in hand. Position upper arm on mat close to body. Bend elbow approximately 90° with dumbbell held upright above elbow. Maintaining 90° bend in elbow, lower dumbbell toward floor until slight stretch is felt in shoulder. Lift dumbbell toward body by internally rotating shoulder until forearm is vertical and repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation (plate.title: Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation (plate loaded)
Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation (plate.description: Lie supine on section of bench furthest away from pads to each side. Position body so shoulders and elbows are aligned to fulcrum on each side. Place wrists or hands on under lower set of pads to each side of head. Pull lever arms upward and toward each side of torso as far as possible by simultaneously rotating upper arms. Lower lever arms to original position and repeat.

Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation.title: Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation
Lever Shoulder Internal Rotation.description: Place elbow on forearm pad and grasp handle with upper arm to side of body and forearm away from body. Pull lever toward from body. Return and repeat. Adjust lever to opposite side and repeat with other arm.

Lever Upright Shoulder Internal Rotation.title: Lever Upright Shoulder Internal Rotation
Lever Upright Shoulder Internal Rotation.description: Primary lever should be positioned back with lever handle resting forward on elbow pad. Lift lever handle and sit on seat with arm pads and lever to side. Place elbow in elbow pads at shoulder height and grip handle with over hand grip so forearm is orientated upward and back. With opposite hand, grasp seat handle if available, for added stability. Pull lever handle forward and downward as far as possible by rotating upper arm. Allow lever to return to original position. Repeat. Continue with opposite arm.

Cable Neck Flexion.title: Cable Neck Flexion
Cable Neck Flexion.description: Sit on bench facing away from middle pulley. Place neck in harness cable attachment. Place arms on lower thighs for support. Move head away from pulley by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Return head by hyperextending neck and repeat.

Cable Neck Flexion (with belt).title: Cable Neck Flexion (with belt)
Cable Neck Flexion (with belt).description: Attach belt on low pulley cable by attaching carabiner on belt buckle. Grasp attached belt, face away from pulley, and place head in belt loop. With belt above ears, clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to back of mid-head. With neck braced and assistance of arm, lunge forward to angle torso forward with feet staggered. Place hand on lower thigh for support. Pull head forward and down by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return by hyperextending neck until head is angled upward. Repeat.

Cable Neck Rotation (with belt).title: Cable Neck Rotation (with belt)
Cable Neck Rotation (with belt).description: Place workout chair or bench with vertical back support facing to one side near adjustable height cable pulley. Adjust pulley approximately height of head when seated. Attach belt on low pulley cable by attaching carabiner on belt buckle. Sit on bench, grasp attached belt from side. Face toward cable pulley and place head in belt loop. With belt above ears, clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close forehead. Position torso upright with feet wide apart and hand nearest cable pulley on lower thigh for added support. Turn head away from pulley cable by rotating head away from pulley. Turn head back toward cable pulley and repeat. Turn seat the opposite direction or attach belt to pulley on opposite side and continue with other side.

Cable Lateral Neck Flexion (with belt).title: Cable Lateral Neck Flexion (with belt)
Cable Lateral Neck Flexion (with belt).description: Adjust pulley approximately height of neck or head when seated. Attach belt on low pulley cable by attaching carabiner on belt buckle. Sit on bench with pulley to one side and feet apart. Place head in belt loop. With belt above ears, clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to side of head. Pull torso upright by bracing opposite hand on far side of bench. Pull head away from pulley cable by laterally flexing neck. Tilt head back toward cable pulley and repeat. Sit on bench the opposite direction and continue with other side.

Lever Neck Flexion (plate loaded).title: Lever Neck Flexion (plate loaded)
Lever Neck Flexion (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat in machine. Position padded lever on face. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head forward by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return head by hyperextending neck and repeat.

Lever Lateral Neck Flexion (plate loaded.title: Lever Lateral Neck Flexion (plate loaded)
Lever Lateral Neck Flexion (plate loaded.description: Sit on seat in machine with feet apart . Position padded lever on side of head. Center body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head down to side by laterally flexing neck. Return head to opposite side and repeat. Sit in machine backwards and continue with opposite side.

Lever Neck Flexion.title: Lever Neck Flexion
Lever Neck Flexion.description: Sit on seat in machine. Position padded lever on face. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head forward by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return head by hyperextending neck and repeat.

Lever Lateral Neck Flexion.title: Lever Lateral Neck Flexion
Lever Lateral Neck Flexion.description: Sit on seat in machine with feet apart. Position side of head on padded lever. Center body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head down to side by laterally flexing neck. Return head to opposite side and repeat. Sit in machine backwards and continue with opposite side.

Weighted Lying Neck Flexion.title: Weighted Lying Neck Flexion
Weighted Lying Neck Flexion.description: Place folded towel on weight plate(s). Lie supine on bench, head extending off of end of bench. Place plates on forehead with towel placed in between for comfort. Move head up by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return by hyperextending neck and repeat.

Weighted Neck Flexion.title: Weighted Neck Flexion
Weighted Neck Flexion.description: Place folded towel on weight plate. Lie supine perpendicular on bench with low back and hips extending off and feet on floor. Place weight and towel on forehead. Place plates on forehead with towel placed in between for comfort. Move head up by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return by hyperextending neck and repeat.

Weighted Lateral Neck Flexion.title: Weighted Lateral Neck Flexion
Weighted Lateral Neck Flexion.description: Place folded towel on weight plate. Lie on bench on side with knees and hips bent and arm hanging over edge. Position weight and towel on side of upper head. Hold weight on side of head with hand of upper arm. Place hand of lower arm on floor for support. Move head up to side by laterally flexing neck. Lower head to opposite side and repeat. Lie on other side and continue.

Front Neck Bridge.title: Front Neck Bridge
Front Neck Bridge.description: Kneel on all fours on well cushioned mat. Place head on mat between hands. Rise and straighten knees. Fold hands behind low back or hips. Roll back onto forehead until nose touches mat. Roll forward onto top of head until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Wall Front Neck Bridge.title: Wall Front Neck Bridge
Wall Front Neck Bridge.description: Place small or folded cushioned mat on wall or column approximately chest height. With hands supporting mat on each side stand back so feet are away from wall or column with body leaning forward. Place top of forehead on mat. Fold hands behind low back or hips. Roll down onto forehead until nose touches mat. Roll up onto top of head until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Wall Side Neck Bridge.title: Wall Side Neck Bridge
Wall Side Neck Bridge.description: Place small or folded cushioned mat on column or at end of wall approximately shoulder height. With hands supporting mat, stand with side toward mat. Step far to side so feet are away from wall or column forward. Place side of head on mat with shoulder extending over end of adjacent side of column or wall so body leans to side. Fold hands behind low back or hips. Push side of head into mat and roll onto top of head moving body away from mat. Return to original position by rolling back down to side of head while bringing shoulder back over end of column or wall. Repeat.

Suspended Neck Flexion.title: Suspended Neck Flexion
Suspended Neck Flexion.description: Place belt or strap around end of suspension trainer. Face away from suspension trainer with belt in hand. Place belt around head above ears and clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to back of mid-head. Step forward until\xa0suspension trainer is taut.\xa0Lean forward at angle against support of belt and suspension trainer by stepping back slightly while keeping head and body straight. Increase angle of body by bowing head until chin touches upper chest. Lower angle of body by raising head. Repeat.

Suspended Lateral Neck Flexion.title: Suspended Lateral Neck Flexion
Suspended Lateral Neck Flexion.description: Place belt or strap around end of suspension trainer. Hold\xa0belt in hand and stand away from suspension trainer so it hangs to one side. Place belt\xa0around head above\xa0ears and clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to head above\xa0ear closest to suspension trainer. Step further away from suspension trainer until it is taut.\xa0Lean away at angle against support of belt and suspension trainer by positioning feet closer to side of suspension trainer while keeping head and body straight. Lower angle of body by tilting head to side of suspension trainer. Increase angle of body by tilting head away from side of suspension trainer.\xa0Repeat and continue in opposite position.

Cable Neck Extension.title: Cable Neck Extension
Cable Neck Extension.description: Sit on bench facing pulley. Place neck in harness cable attachment. Place forearms on lower thighs for support. Move head away from pulley by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Cable Neck Extension (with belt).title: Cable Neck Extension (with belt)
Cable Neck Extension (with belt).description: Sit on bench facing low pulley. Attach belt on low pulley cable by attaching carabiner on belt buckle. Place head in belt loop. With belt above ears, clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to forehead. Place other hand or forearm on lower thighs for support. Pull head up and back by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Neck Extension (plate loaded).title: Lever Neck Extension (plate loaded)
Lever Neck Extension (plate loaded).description: Sit on seat in machine. Place back of head under padded lever. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head back by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Lever Neck Extension.title: Lever Neck Extension
Lever Neck Extension.description: Sit on seat in machine. Place back of head under padded lever. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support. Move head back by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck forward until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Weighted Lying Neck Extension.title: Weighted Lying Neck Extension
Weighted Lying Neck Extension.description: Lie prone on bench with head extended off of end and folded towel and weight plate(s) on floor. With both hands, place plate(s) on back of head with towel placed in between for comfort. Move head up by hyperextending neck up as high as possible. Return by bending neck down until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Weighted Neck Extension.title: Weighted Neck Extension
Weighted Neck Extension.description: Kneel on side of bench with weight plates on end of bench. With both hands, hold weight plate(s) cushioned with towel. Position upper body prone and perpendicular on bench with head and arms extending off of side. With both hands, place weight plate(s) on back of head with towel placed in between for comfort. Move head up by hyperextending neck up as high as possible. Return by bending neck down until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Weighted Seated Neck Extension.title: Weighted Seated Neck Extension
Weighted Seated Neck Extension.description: Place folded towel on weight plate. On bench or stool, sit bent over on thighs. With both hands, place plate(s) on back of head with towel placed in between for comfort. Move head up by hyperextending neck up as high as possible. Return by bending neck down until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Weighted Neck Harness Extension.title: Weighted Neck Harness Extension
Weighted Neck Harness Extension.description: Sit on bench with weighted neck harness on head. Allow weight to dangle in front by bending over. Move head up by hyperextending neck. Return by bending neck down until chin touches upper chest. Repeat.

Band Resistive Neck Retraction.title: Band Resistive Neck Retraction
Band Resistive Neck Retraction.description: Stand with back of neck against exercise band strapped accross rack. Position both arms behind bands to each side. Hold horizontal bar above if within reach. Push back of neck into band by retracting head. Returning head to neutral postion and repeat.

Rear Neck Bridge.title: Rear Neck Bridge
Rear Neck Bridge.description: Lying supine on well cushioned mat. Position feet very close to hips. Raise buttocks and low back slightly off of floor and fold hands on abdomen. Extend hips and knees while pushing head back into floor. Roll back on head while arching spine high off of floor. Hyperextend neck back in attempt to bring forehead toward mat. Return body to close to mat until back of head and shoulders make contact with mat. Repeat.

Wall Rear Neck Bridge.title: Wall Rear Neck Bridge
Wall Rear Neck Bridge.description: Hold small or folded cushioned mat behind head. Facing away from wall or column position head and back of shoulders low on wall or column with mat between. Stand with feet far away from wall or column so body is angled back. Position hips and back straight and bend knees just slightly. Place arms to side or hold hands on abdomen. Push head back into mat and roll head upward. Arch spine and straighten knees. Hyperextend neck so head is facing up. Return to origianl position by rolling head down while allowing low back to straighten and knees to bend slightly. Continue down until back of head and shoulders make contact with mat. Repeat.

Lying Neck Retraction Isometric.title: Lying Neck Retraction Isometric
Lying Neck Retraction Isometric.description: Lie supine on mat. Push head into mat and hold position. Relax and repeat.CommentsThis exercise may be prescribed for functional forward head posture since it strengthens Splenius without neck flexion. The stretch that occurs during complete neck flexion, may exacerbate forward head posture, particularly if neck flexion is held under load. Neck flexion normally occurs at end of eccentric portion of dynamic Splenius exercises.Neck retraction primarily consists of Cervical Flexion (spine) accompanied by subtle Thoracic Flexion (spine) and Neck Flexion (atlanto-occipital joint). Cervical spine has natural lordotic curvature (see diagram of spine). Much of the retraction motion is actually flattening or slight reversing the normal lordosis. The deep neck flexors perform majority of movement. Slight neck Flexion at the atlanto-occipital joint also occurs to maintain forward head positioning.Also see similar exercise Neck Retraction Stretch.

Suspended Neck Extension.title: Suspended Neck Extension
Suspended Neck Extension.description: Place belt or strap around end of suspension trainer. Place belt around head above ears and clamp belt snugly around head by tightly gripping ends close to forehead. Step back facing direction of suspension trainer\xa0until it is taut. Lean back at angle against support of belt and suspension trainer by stepping forward slightly while keeping head and body straight. Lower angle of body by bowing head until chin is near upper chest. Increase angle of body by raising head.\xa0Repeat.CommentsThis exercise can be performed with belt looped on TRXⓇ style suspension trainer or adjustable length gymnastics rings. Throughout movement, keep body straight and maintain tight\xa0grip on belt against forehead. Use neck to pull belt rather than allowing hand to assist.Woven cotton or cloth belts tend to slip less, particularly on bald head. If belt slips from head, place small towel between belt and head. Belts not made specifically for weight training may cause injury if they fail under load in which they were not designed.
